title: OfferUp - Buy. Sell. Offer Up
description:
Buy. Sell. Simple.

Join the largest mobile marketplace for local buyers and sellers! 

OfferUp makes it easy to find great deals on the things you want and make money on the things you want to sell. Ditch the Classified Ads and garage sales -- this is the best way to buy and sell in your community or neighborhood with people you can trust.

How it works:

• Buy or sell anything; easily offer up your items for sale in 30 seconds. 
• Find great deals and discounts on clothes, shoes, furniture, cell phones, electronics, baby & kids items, sports equipment, used cars, home goods and more.
• Use reputation features like ratings and profiles to see who you’re dealing with and build trust. 
• Shop local items for sale with thousands of new postings daily. 
• Message buyers and sellers securely from within the app. 
• Build your reputation with your unique seller profile page. 
• Browse items by image and sort by category or location. 
• Join millions of people using OfferUp across the country. 
• Skip the garage sale! OfferUp is the simplest way to buy and sell locally.

Fun facts about OfferUp:

1. With OfferUp you can easily sell anything like clothes and shoes, used cars, electronics and home goods.
2. OfferUp shows you what’s selling nearby, right in your neighborhood. 
3. Communication between buyers & sellers happens through the app via secure messaging.
4. OfferUp is better than a garage sale; shop anything you want at a discount, right on your phone or tablet.

Be part of the community: 

We’re making local buying and selling an experience that everyone can try and trust. The community at the heart of our marketplace is what makes that possible. When you join OfferUp, you’re joining millions of people helping each other make money and save money around the nation -- and right in the neighborhood.

Enhanced user experience and stability.

Thanks for using OfferUp and keep the feedback coming!
You can contact us by going to the Help Center in the app or on the web.
comments: Update: app sucks. When not let me in and keeps giving me an error code. So tired of this inconsistency and being locked out. SNAP!! it locks you out of your messages and then asks you to register as if you don't have an account. I've only been using this for about six months and it's already happened three times. Can't reply to people's messages. Missed sales. very frustrating. Not sure why they aren't fixing this problem because according to other people it's been going on a long time

No support on bugs at all. I do not get audio notifications for items I'm selling. example: a person messages me wanting to buy an item, I see it FOUR HOURS later. response .metrics/times are way up to an hour because of this bug. could have lost the sale and look like a clown for not responding when OFFERUP NEVER NOTIFIED ME. What's up guys? This sucks. Update: There literally is NO support. Just random comments trying to look like they are actively doing something. they definitely aren't

The app works well for the most part and does have some consistently great deals. After their last update I had to reinstall the app in order to do a new post, which has me a bit concerned on their regression testing process. Just an annoyance, I would still recommend folks trying it out.

Seems like it could have been a good marketplace with good deals but you can't actually buy anything. Sellers just never respond to even full price offers or worse accept then cancel the sale. Days or even weeks wasted. Unreliable or inactive sellers/listings need to be removed. Too frustrating as is, uninstalled.

OfferUp used to be so good. Now it's riddled with bugs, scams, and overall just a terrible experience. For the past year I've been unable to post from mobile data and now I can't log in. No way to contact support, not that they do anything anyway. Time to ditch OfferUp and find a better app to sell on.

comments: I sat thru 5 min of damn ads just simply trying to open the app!!! I still didn't get it open! This is ridiculous over the top!! I've had offer up for years on my phone however I had to do a reset and needed to redownload it and when I did it was a whole new experience and I'm not pleased so I'm not going to be keeping an eye on my phone!

I attempted to use the Web site for browsing prices. It seems there is no way of doing so with out allowing access to my Facebook account and those who I am acquainted with or related to. This is something I choose not to on matter of principal. What happened to the days of window shopping. I dislike anything that forces you to give it up for nothing in return particularly if all I am doing is browsing.
I downloaded the app but couldn't get any further. I kept clicking on next and it would take to the beginning and the advertisement wouldn't stop !! Had to delete it.
I can't even search for anything anymore, I can only see nothing but OfferUp tips and when I press home, it does the same thing over and over
I was told that this is a great app for selling things. So I installed it and am trying to use it for the 1st time; however, I can't place the first ad because of pop-up ads.

title: letgo: Buy & Sell Used Stuff, Cars, Furniture
description:
🏆 letgo is Google Play Editor's choice
Join one of the biggest marketplace apps! Install our selling and shopping app to start trading up secondhand items in the mobile marketplace!

letgo is a go-to marketplace app to sell your stuff and find the best offers on secondhand finds like used cars, secondhand electronics, and used video games!

Find the best deals on preowned items today! Even better than buying in secondhand shops or an online thrift store!

Find the best offers online on secondhand items that you actually need, and make the best offers to sell your used items and earn money! 

Looking to buy home goods and vintage furniture? Seeking used video games or secondhand electronics or a used car? Get used items and vintage stuff on letgo! 🎉

letgo is the perfect online marketplace to buy and sell locally! No need to visit a used car dealership or thrift store to find the best local deals on used items and vintage stuff! Here you’ll find a wide selection of like-new products, from used cars for sale, home goods, used electronics, vintage clothes, used furniture, used books, used vehicles, exercise equipment, retro games and electronics, to houses and apartments for rent or sale. It’s everything you can wish for!

letgo is one of the biggest and fastest growing app to buy and sell locally. Over 100 million downloads and 200 million listings! Here's why tens of millions of people are buying and selling on letgo:

MILLIONS OF LISTINGS
• USED CARS - Think of us as your used car dealership. Whether you are looking for a used toyota, a pre owned ford or an old chevrolet, we’ll help you find the best used car for you. Explore used cars for sale, used trucks, used suv, used motorcycles, dirt bikes, and many more.
• HOUSING - Looking to sell your property or into real estate investing? Find and list properties like: apartments, houses for sale, studios for sale and other real estate!  
• SELL ELECTRONICS - Used PS4 and other used video games, used electronics, used laptops, used computers, used smartphones and much more.
• Shop for the best deals on anything you need in an online garage sale. From used furniture, dresses, shoes and watches, to vintage books, used toys, used laptops a new iPhone or Samsung Galaxy, a secondhand car and even real estate for sale or rent! You can even find listings for free stuff!
• Find and offer barter deals or services at affordable prices.

FAST AND CUTTING-EDGE
• List items in seconds, as effortlessly as taking a photo. letgo's the only app with advanced technology that automatically titles and categorizes your listing, whether you’re selling a used iPhone or a used car! Find the best deals at letgo today.
• Make money selling your like-new items. It’s safe and easy.

FUN, SIMPLE AND INTUITIVE
•Discover stuff for sale nearby or search for something specific.
•Check out other users’ profiles, ratings and reviews, and chat instantly in the app.

* Buying a used car or selling your used car? We’ve made it even easier to buy and sell used cars, SUVs, trucks, motorcycles and other vehicles. Find your dream car on letgo - at a fraction of the price!
 
Download letgo and start selling your stuff, shopping for the best brands and finding discount deals on anything from fashion, electronics and used cars!

Less Stuff, More Living. Live & letgo!

Team letgo

info@letgo.com

recentChanges:
What’s new:
• Revamped user reviews: buy and sell with confidence and show everyone you’re the real deal!
• Buyers and sellers will now have 7 days to review one another after completing a transaction - and your reviews won’t be visible until you’ve both completed one or the 7-day window has ended

Like it? LOVE it? Share your feedback and rate us in the Google Play Store to let us know! And if you have any questions or suggestions, give us a shout at support@letgo.com!

the letgo team
comments: The old version is way better than the new version because the old app was simple and easy to follow and you can see everything on the page together. The new version has too much information that you don't need scattered in-between too many pop-ups and if you don't know to keep strolling down you will miss the other items the seller is selling and they loose out. Go back to the last version. This version doesn't make sense.

Great app. The distance setting in the search filter was a little off. Like I tried putting in items up to 30 miles away but it had some stuff in there that was to me like 40-50 miles away. It seemed better when I narrowed it closer to my location though. That's the only issue I've experienced with it. The process to post what you want to sell is NOT overly complicated, it's simple to use, but it's kind odd looking for me though. But that's just my opinion there, everything else seems great.

I've had great success with this app, my only complaint is regarding the ads. I do understand to keep this app 100% you need to show ads but I find them to be repetative, rather intrusive and very large. If you don't know to keep scrolling once you see a large ad then you will miss out on a lot things for sale.

It's a great way to make extra money. It's fun to meet with all the interesting people however there are a few flaws to the game. For instance, it is a turn off when a person promises to purchase and they give a date and time then they never show up! Its It's frustrating, and a waste of time I wish that LETGO could implement some kind of consequence for the people that stand people doing things

This is a platform that works and is built well. However the app still has many bugs. They're mostly annoying, some are a little inconvenient. None of them inhibit use of the platform though. They've got a ways to go, and are founded on solid ground. Personalized recommended searches must be based on nothing, because I get recommendations for electronics but all I search for a bit are clothes. Notifications to my phone duplicate themselves, lag, and are sometimes broken.

title: 5miles: Buy and Sell Used Stuff Locally
description:
5miles opened a new channel called 5miles Dash. It is a new auction feature that allows you to bid on brand new items.
- Auctions last 90 seconds and bids start at $1.
- Only pay when you win.
- Items are shipped directly to your door.
- If user is unsatisfied with a product, we offer buyer protection so you can request a refund.
- Claim up $5 in credits towards your first purchase.

5miles is the top-rated buy and sell app: local shopping made easy, safe, and fun. Discover great classifieds in your area or far away. Buy & sell your stuff, find a place to live, hire local services, or get a new job all from the comfort of your smartphone. FREE to list. FREE to discover. Buy and sell within 5 miles.

FREE to list. FREE to discover. FREE to boost. All within 5 miles.

Easy
• Snap a photo and offer up your items in seconds
• Use GPS and zip code to find thousands of listings nearby
• Make an offer by sending an in app chat message
• Free to boost your post to send it to the top of the feed
• Easy registration via Facebook or email
• Share your listings via Facebook, Twitter, SMS, and Email

Safe
• Email, phone, and Facebook verifications
• Rate and read reviews of buyers and sellers
• Use our Safe Area Exchange Locator (SEAL) feature to find a secure meetup spot 
• 5miles team constantly monitors listings and chats to keep fraud away
• 5miles doesn't share your information with anyone
• Don't want to meetup? Choose shipping for your exchange method

Fun
• Discover great stuff near and far by browsing photos
• Search and filter to find relevant listing
• Like items and follow sellers
• Make offers and get the best deals
• Chat to share more details, photos, and meeting spots
• Share listings to Facebook and Twitter to sell faster

What makes 5miles different from other buy and sell apps?
1. Phone number verification to reduce spam and fraud
2. Access to SEAL (Safe Exchange Area Locators)
3. Boost, a feature to move your listings to the top of the feed, free of charge
4. User reviews
6. Includes Services, Jobs, and Housing categories
6. Tools to help sellers sell faster
7. Shipping and online payment features
8. Find or post Deals & Events in your area. Everything from restaurant deals to estate sales.

5miles is like having your own online garage sale without the hassle. You can search for products like furniture, household goods, electronics, cell phones, cars, auto parts, jewelry, purses, clothing, shoes, and more....

Find a cleaning service, handyman, plumber, babysitter, mover, creative professionals and more. Make sure to check their reviews first to find one you can trust.

Looking for housing? Find apartments, houses, and condos for rent or sale. Landlords, list your real estate in a snap!

Looking for work? Find jobs near you! Full-time, part-time, freelance jobs, or short gigs. 

Looking for your next happy hour, hair cut, massage, car repair deal, and more? Check out our Deals & Events. Find or post everything from garage sales to service deals to automotive deals and many more.

How to use 5miles:

Buying

1) Browse listings
2) Make an offer or chat with the seller
3) Have the item shipped or meet up with the seller

Selling

1) Snap a photo, set the price and add a description
2) Communicate with buyers through the in app chat feature
3) Ship or meet up with a buyer

FREE for everyone. No service or transaction fees to buy or sell.

Download now and discover great things from the 5miles community. Enjoy the experience of selling and buying locally. Are you ready to go shopping?

Want to find out more about us? 
https://www.5miles.com/

More ways to connect with 5miles:
http://facebook.com/5milesapp
http://twitter.com/5milesapp
http://instagram.com/5milesapp
Email: hello@5milesapp.com

comments: Taking advantage of Coronavirus to make money by featuring upcharged health products. The virus toll counter is also updated slowly, as there have been way more confirmed cases than it says. I used to like this app, but I never thought it would get this scummy.

Ive always enjoyed this app but i dont think they push the sale of local items that much i think they are more concered with the auctions and the Dash section. Ive bought 2 items with both arriving broken and yes they refunded my money but wouldnt send another one to replace it nor any compensation for the trouble it caused me both times. It makes me think i shouldnt buy from dash anymore you cant contact the seller individually. I do like the point system though so 5 stars it is for now

App has changed so much, it's just not the same. Pitiful views, no boost option except with coin rewards which are just a waste of time to complete, and why is this app using over 1G of my storage space? That's un heard of. The Dash feature needs to be monitored unless this is no longer a family friendly app, I mean items range from crotchless lingerie to bondage looking items and barely nude models showcasing these? Seriously guys, not family friendly at all

find anything you need on this app at awesome prices!!! EDITED: I live in the United States but for some reason when I try to share the link to friends or share the app for them to download, it says "sorry this is not available in your country" ??? So exactly what countries actually get the rewards for sharing the app with their friends? I will change my review back to 5 stars when I get a good reason for this. Other than is issue, I have loved the app so please let me know why.

Better than other apps, but still needs work. I miss the shipping feature since it helped me get some cool stuff not usually found local. That should still be up to the seller though. The coins feel gimmicky, and kinda more annoying than fun. Still need to not be able to rate literally anyone you have a conversation with ( black mirror anyone?) And as for "removing inappropriate ratings", still have it on there after 4 yrs, but removed their's.

title: Free Stuff Alerts for Craigslist, Letgo & offer up
description:
Free Stuff Alerts
Receive a notification each time your neighbor post Free Stuff on Craigslist, Letgo, OfferUp and more!
Be the first to claim that freebie for you!

Each day people give away things that they don't longer need, most of them are in really great condition, some things don't fit the new place, some just to make space, some things because people move away and can't take those things with them, etcetera and etcetera...


NO LOGIN REQUIRED:
 1. Install the app.
 2. You are ready to receive FREE ITEMS!
That's all, Simple. Smart. Easy.

YOU WILL GET FREE STUFF FROM:
 • Craigslist
 • Letgo
 • OfferUp
 • TrashNothing
 • And More!

Free Stuff Alerts will send you an alert notification each time your neighbor give away something, click the notification and if it's something that you need, you just contact that person and pick the freebie up! Make it yours first!.

• Tired of seeing "23 interested" people on a free thing that you would love to have?
• Tired of enter every single minute to check if theres is something new in the Free Stuff section on Craigslist?
• Tired of "First come, First serve" and when you appeared to that location the free stuff you wanted is gone, because someone took it first? Lucky b....rd!
• Tired of the red "Sold" on something that you were asking but someone claim it first? Yeah, that is sad.


Try Free Stuff Alerts for FREE
You will be receiving notifications in your phone in real time at the instance that your neighbor just post some free stuff!

----

This app does not have any kind of business nor commercial relationship with CraigsList Inc, LetGo.com (Ambatana Holdings B.V.), OfferUp, Inc and TrashNothing.com, This is a third party app.

comments: Great app, depending on what you're looking for, you could find a lot of cool and/or quality products. Theres plenty of things I've seen that would've been perfect for me, if only I had more space, like an extra room for an pool table or piano. Theres also other useful things, like lumber, fencing posts, bricks, and plenty of other building materials, that if I knew how, I could've used also.

I like the thought and execution of this app. People tend to remove listings quickly and not let them hang around once someone takes the posted item. Some people will not like the large amount of notiffications. I appreciate it actually. When I moved I had nothing to move in with. Only took a few days to have all the stuff I needed to live confortably.

Ive only had one problem with the app so far. There was 2 ads with the same picture, but couldn't find either one following Google map. Good thing you can message the people who are giving the stuff away and was able to meet up with them later on. When I did meet with them the location was nowhere near where Google map was directing me to.

I love this app. I get to see what is posted for free the MOMENT it's posted on one of the four sites like craigslist or letgo. Yes you can simply go to Craigslist and check the free section.. BUT! With free stuff alerts it notifies you immediately all in one spot instead of having to go searching it's brought right to you. Very cool and very fun.

Amazing app. I've gotten sooo much stuff it's literally saved me thousands. I got enough fence to go around my entire yard, peg board to organize my tools and garage. 150 cinder blocks to build a burn pit and benches. Sherwin Williams paint! It goes on and on and on. Honestly best app ever in my mind!!!!

title: ClicFlyer: Weekly Offers, Promotions & Deals
description:
ClicFlyer is an app that is transforming the shopping experience for people like you in KSA, Kuwait, UAE, Bahrain, Qatar, Oman, Egypt & Jordan by creating a single platform with easy access to weekly offers catering to your family needs, from all the leading retailers. Our aim is to bring to you huge savings on your weekly grocery bills while making shopping easy and fun. 

Browse flyers, learn about offer discounts, directly search and save offers, create your own shopping list and locate stores to grab the best offers. You can plan ahead, even before stepping into the store. We bring to you the latest information on the offers to ensure you never miss a great deal again.

With ClicFlyer you can find grocery offers online when it suits you and where it suits you - regardless of whether you're at home, on the road or out shopping. If looking for a specific item, you can use the search function and quickly compare offers across the various flyers online. For easy access while shopping, you can save offers and add items to the shopping list with a quick sign up process. Also, share your saved offers with your family and friends so they can save money too. In short, with ClicFlyer, you save time and money, as the app gives you access to the largest selection of grocery retailers online and helps you get an overview of the country's many offerings.

You can find offers in a number of ways:

Trending Offers - Check out most popular offers in your city
Retailers - Browse latest weekly flyers and thousands of offers from your favorite retailers
Categories - Click on various categories to check latest offers you are looking for

List of features:
- Mark your favorite retailers so that they are always first.
- Find offers with best discounts on the flyer using the discount slider.
- Save your offers for easy access while shopping
- Simplify weekly shopping with Shopping List. Add, edit and find offers easily.
- Tap on offers for additional info - offer period, offer price, similar offers
- Learn about retailer stores and use mobile maps to get to the closest branch
- Search Offers with smart suggestions.
- Customize your offer search by sorting & filtering on retailers, categories, and Brands
- Share your favorite offers with your friends & family 
- Stay updated with alerts for new flyers, nearby offers or expiring offers and more!

Feel free to contact us at support@clicflyer.com

title: Groupon - Shop Deals, Discounts & Coupons
description:
Download Groupon and save up to 70% on the things you need every day. Find great deals on all the best stuff to eat, see, and do near you and around the world.

Save on everything you’re looking for. Whether you’re craving a new restaurant in town, or daydreaming about tropical travel, a daily replenishment of deals delivers all the discounts you like.

Every deal is available to use immediately, so you’re never more than a few taps away from a relaxing massage, tickets to the night’s hottest event, or a great pizza joint.

With the Groupon app you can:
•  Get promo codes and special savings alerts for deals near you, instantly on your mobile device
•  Buy and redeem Groupon deals directly from your mobile device, no need to print vouchers or clip coupons
•  Read customer reviews and write your own
•  Share deals with friends and family

And there’s more:
•  Instantly redeem on-demand deals on food, fun, fashion, and wellness, without having to print a voucher
•  Get up to 30% cash back at participating Groupon+ restaurants
•  Travel to exotic destinations and stay at the fanciest hotels with Groupon Getaways
•  Shop for fun themed collections for holidays and events

Put down the coupon book and pick up the Groupon Android app—your ticket to explore the best your city has to offer at savings of up to 70% off.

Need help? Contact us at https://www.groupon.com/customer_support

recentChanges: Thanks for using the Groupon app! Here at Groupon, we strive to deliver the best deals to you by improving your experience every time we release a new version of our app. Our updates include many new features, improvements and bug fixes.
comments: Local Deals- Pros: 1. Makes enjoying life a lot easier & cheaper. 2. Can rebuy, extend, or exchange. Cons: 1. Very specific rules. 2. Not always available per deal. Product Deals- Pros: 1. Much cheaper than regular prices on most items. 2. Current on fads/trends. 3. Can keep items in cart for desired time frame. Cons: 1. Some require many extra steps being time consuming & confusing. 2. Shipping takes FOREVER! 3. Stock usually low or sold out. SITE- HORRIBLE Customer service

Definitely worth to save money on things you'd like to do. Especially sales for going out to eat or entertainment. Also, some sales are insanely good. A local MMA gym had a month's worth of class for $13... Most gyms cost $300. This app is also good if you want to try new things, but are reluctant to spend a huge amount on something you may not like.

I really enjoy using groupon but trying to talk to someone about an issue is nearly impossible, to chat with a person is very disappointing, I feel as I am being rushed and nothing get accomplished, this is very frustrating. I accidentally purchased 2 of the same deal and was trying to let someone know about the issue and was told it was refunded but I do not see where it has been and now trying to find out more info on the situation has become very stressful

Been using for years with mostly good experiences. Bought a few deals before coronavirus and customer service helped me to get groupon bucks so the deals wouldnt go to waste during the outbreak. Customer service very accommodating. I only wish more places would offer a groupon, seems to be the same few local places for months and months.

Its a good app, has some bargains but could do with combining some postage charges. Have had to return a couple of clothes items but groupon sort problems out almost on the spot and i've bought lots of goods with no problems at all. All in all, great!

title: Swapit - Buy & Sell Used Stuff
description:
Swapit brings buyers and sellers together to trade pre-loved items. Our unique approach to create a hyper-local marketplace, makes your shopping experience one of a kind.

Swapit is free to use, free to sell and free to buy. Give it try now!

With the Swapit app you can:

• Sell easily and quickly.
• Shop for pre-loved and new items nearby your current location, or across town.
• Get stuff for free.
• Know the item's location.
• View the buyer's or seller's profile.
• Chat privately with sellers and buyers. Seamless, directly in the app.
• Negotiate prices.
• Search for items in different categories.
• Enjoy a truly mobile marketplace right on your phone!

SELLER'S PERKS

• Sell quick. It takes less than 30 seconds to post an item.
• List for free with up to 3 photos.
• Sell pre-loved or new items.
• Offer items for free if you wish.
• No fee charged. It is really 100% free! No more percentage, commission or transaction fees for your listings.
• Chat directly with potential buyers in private chats.
• Easily share your items on your Facebook timeline or in Facebook groups - reach thousands of potential buyers.
• Easily share your items through WeChat, WhatsApp, BBM, email, SMS or more.
• Straight forward management of your seller profile.
• Sell stuff and make some money from it. It takes just some seconds.

BUYER'S PERKS

• Browse for items in your neighborhood.
• Get notified when items nearby pop up.
• Show your interest in certain product categories.
• You want it right now? Get it right now.
• Items nearby can be easily picked up within minutes.
• Chat directly with sellers in private chats. No emails, no phone calls needed. Seamless and easy.
• Filter items by price range, category, condition and more.
• Swapit - the hyper local marketplace that's always open 24/7.

PREMIUM SERVICES

Swapit offers premium features that make it tremendously faster to sell your items to people nearby. Such premium are absolutely optional and can be purchased if you'd like to take advantage of them. Swapit's free marketplace still is free for buyers and sellers and will remain free. Swapit's Premium features just provide additional benefits to take full advantage of the entire Swapit trading platform.

PRE-LOVED EXPLAINED

Pre-Loved items are second hand items, which are still in good and sometimes in excellent condition. Such items were used by the owner (now seller) and are offered on Swapit.

PRIVACY

We respect your privacy. We don’t share your information. Period.

SECURITY and SAFETY

Swapit uses your Google Account to verify the authenticity of you as a user. Therefore, Swapit requires a Google Account to be set up on your Android device. If you are not logged into your Google Account on your device, Swapit will ask you to do so, to ensure you are authenticated properly. As part of this, Swapit gets access to your Google Account's email address. We will only use this email address for account-related issues regarding your Swapit account, should there be any need for this in future.

BETA NOTICE

Swapit is still in beta. Bugs may occur and we appreciate your feedback.


Download the "swapit" app for free and enjoy the hyper-local marketplace on-the-go!


You have problems? Before writing a review, please reach out to us by email via beta@swapit.la. We're here to help.

Want to know more about swapit?
Visit our website: http://swapit.la
Read our blog: https://blog.swapit.la

Get in touch with us:
+ Join us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/swapitla
+ Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/swapitla
+ Follow us on Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/swapitla
+ Send an email: info@swapit.la

title: OffaPOP - OFFER APP
description:
Aiyo "I forgot about that offer machhi. I could have saved some money" – sounds familiar? when we go to the shopping mall to shop or to eat at the restaurant, we invariably forget to claim the offer or discount and pay the full price on the goods/service. As a result we lose money and get frustrated.

OffaPOP reminder you to claim the offers/discounts. 

The app receive the offer and discount from your favourite merchants/shops and categorizes those offers into Fashion, Health, Travel, Spa etc.

Once done, the app acts as a reminder system to help us in the following ways:

1. We can see personalised offer messages based on our previous shopping pattern 
2. At home, it reminds us about the offers that are expiring today/soon 
3. Automatically recognize that we are physically in a particular merchant's store/outlet and display ONLY relevant offers

Sounds interesting? Wanna Try?


Join the movement. Let the Offers POP. Let’s save a ton of money!

Visit www.offapop.com
Email us @ info@offapop.com
Like us @ https://www.facebook.com/offapop2018

- 5000+ Verified Offers & Deals
- 1.2 Million Coupons Already Redeemed

With the help of the application user can easily find new and best offers using our features like

● Daily Best Offers & Deals: Find out which offers and coupons are trending and save money on all your online shopping from various stores and categories.

● Notifications:  You will always be notified for hot deals & Exclusive promo codes for online shopping.

● Follow your favourite stores: Follow online stores you wish and stay up to date with latest offers.

●  Immersive Design: User-friendly app interface with an easy to use Landing Page Design.
Easy Search: We made search easier for you. Just type the name of online store or product and the best results will be there in front of you.


Popular Offer Categories

● Fashion offers : If you are looking for a discount on your online shopping & want to cut your bill than you are at the right APP. We will provide 100% verified coupons & deals for top fashion stores like Flipkart, Amazon, Myntra, Jabong, Ajio, Koovs, Limeroad, Shein, Mr.Voonik, Bewakoof, Lifestyle, Pantaloons, MyVishal, NNNOW, Shoppers Stop, FBB Fashion, Snapdeal and more. 

● Travel coupons : Save big on all categories of travel like Bus, Domestic and International Flight & Cab. Get 100% Verified travel cashback offers & deals from stores like Redbus, AbhiBus, MakeMyTrip, Uber, Ola, Zoomcar, Revv, Yatra, goibibo and more. Save upto Rs.1000 on Flight Tickets and save every time on your bus booking.

● Online Food Ordering : Food is more delicious when bought at a discounted price. Get upto 50% OFF from swiggy coupon codes, 60% OFF on uber eats order with verified promo codes, 40% OFF on Domino’s Pizza and offers for all other stores.

● Movies & Entertainment Deals : Planning to book movie tickets ?? Then don’t pay full amount and use our verified deals and save your money. Get BOGO (Buy 1 Get 1 Free Movie Tickets) offers from BookMyShow, PayTm and TicketNew.  Get Extra Wallet cashback on movie ticket booking by using our offers. 

● Online Medicine Offers : Save an Extra 10% on Medicine orders by using our verified deals. Find trending PharmEasy, Medlife, 1mg coupons & Deals + Get Extra Cashback and cut your bill by using Our APP.

● Recharge Coupons : Discover verified and secret recharge coupons for your prepaid or postpaid recharge, DTH Bill, Electricity Bill, Gas Bill with promo codes and deals from PayTm, AmazonPay, PhonePe, GooglePay, Mobikwik, Freecharge. Get best deals on Airtel, Vodafone, Jio, Idea, BSNL Recharge.

● Find Cashback offers, deals, discounts & coupons on restaurants, buffets, pizzas, spa, massages, salons, gyms, amusement parks(Adlabs Imagica, Essel World), theme parks near you.

● Smartphones Deals: Stay Notified with Flipkart mobile sale deals, Xiaomi(Mi) Deals, Samsung Price drop deals, Honor mobile deals, TataCliq mobile deals, Amazon mobile deals.

● Special Offers: Find curated offer collection and best deals for various online shopping festivals like “Amazon Prime Day Sale”, “Amazon Great Indian Festival”,”Flipkart Big Billion Days”,”Myntra End of Reason Sale”,”Shopclues Triple Friday Sale” and others.

● Bank Offers : Find relevant offers for your credit card and make the most use of it. Find offers on BookMyShow, Swiggy, MakeMyTrip, Zomato, OyoRooms, Amazon, Flipkart, Snapdeal and all other stores.

● Grocery Coupons : Save big on your routine monthly expenses with best deals from BigBasket, Amazon Pantry, Grofers, Flipkart Supermart, PaytmMall & More stores. Get Extra Rs.500 OFF on various Bank Cards and  huge discount on First Order.

title: CPlus for Craigslist
description:
Searching for daily classifieds, job ads, yard sales, garage sales, car sales or dating ads? CPlus for Craigslist is exactly what you need. Not only can you search for all types of classified ads but you can also search multiple cities at a time from your mobile. You can customize your profile by marking your favorite ads and postings. Posting to sell can never be so easy.

CPlus makes Craigslist easier to use. There are a ton of added features to make browsing, searching and posting on Craigslist, smooth, effective and it is absolutely free.

## Awesome App, Amazing Features ##

- Geo-location enables you to automatically find nearby cities.
- Multiple city search for ads and classifieds.
- Multiple display modes for Search Results: Photo+description view, photo grid view, photo album view, map view and big photo view.
- Searches can be saved to start screen and avoid repetition of same searches.
- Postings can be saved to your favorite list. Also Add notes to your favorite postings.
- Update search in the result page including category, filter and sorting.
- Native in-app posting for creating new ads and classifieds to buy, sell, rent products and services.
- Renew, edit or repost your ads and manage multiple accounts from your iPhone.
- Great mobile optimization for easy readability and functionality.

CPlus for Craigslist is a Free to use app! Stay tuned to get updates and constant improvements and new features from us, regularly.

Let us know your valuable feedback at yanflex@gmail.com or show us your support by rating us.
descriptionHTML:
Searching for daily classifieds, job ads, yard sales, garage sales, car sales or dating ads? CPlus for Craigslist is exactly what you need. Not only can you search for all types of classified ads but you can also search multiple cities at a time from your mobile. You can customize your profile by marking your favorite ads and postings. Posting to sell can never be so easy.

CPlus makes Craigslist easier to use. There are a ton of added features to make browsing, searching and posting on Craigslist, smooth, effective and it is absolutely free.

## Awesome App, Amazing Features ##

- Geo-location enables you to automatically find nearby cities.
- Multiple city search for ads and classifieds.
- Multiple display modes for Search Results: Photo+description view, photo grid view, photo album view, map view and big photo view.
- Searches can be saved to start screen and avoid repetition of same searches.
- Postings can be saved to your favorite list. Also Add notes to your favorite postings.
- Update search in the result page including category, filter and sorting.
- Native in-app posting for creating new ads and classifieds to buy, sell, rent products and services.
- Renew, edit or repost your ads and manage multiple accounts from your iPhone.
- Great mobile optimization for easy readability and functionality.

CPlus for Craigslist is a Free to use app! Stay tuned to get updates and constant improvements and new features from us, regularly.

Let us know your valuable feedback at yanflex@gmail.com or show us your support by rating us.

comments: Always was an excellent app. Never any problems. All of a sudden in the last week or 2 I cant look at my posts or anything. Says I need to update my password and to go to a link that doesnt exist or show up. WTH? I cant even find my password page or know how to change or update on the app. Please fix asap!

Crashes constantly. You have to go to the main screen, refresh and then start over. What's bugging down the app? This is obviously not the apps fault , but ads are flagged and removed seconds after you post them. No reason at all. And support is a hoot. They put in sarcastic morons as forum help to berate people for having the audacity to figure out a problem. What utter stupidity. No wonder other selling platforms have surpassed them. They need new management overhaul or risk going obsolete

I hate the UI on this, it is so plain boring and outdated. I hate how it has to load areas that doesn't have the vehicle, I'd rather it load the places that do so I don't have to scroll. Please add an option where you can search nationwide instead of having to check boxes of location. Overall, it kinda gets the job done, could definitely be better.

***EDIT*** NOTHING UNDER THE "WHAT'S NEW" HEADING SAYS "NOW WITH INLINE ADS AMONG LISTINGS REQUIRE PAID VERSION TO REMOVE" eral good work. Craigslist is one of the greatest websites ever and one of the few places you can go on the internet and actually use the service without having to create an account and sign in which is VERY refreshing! So yeah, they can pretty much do no wrong in my eyes. But anyway, good work on the app...it's not as good as the old CraigsNotifica app but still

Worked good for a while. Now it is slow, shows no results most of time, favorites are missing, doesn't remember searches and wants me to upgrade to Pro. I already upgraded a long time ago. Now it wants more? Nope.

title: Swap Hub - Buy, Sell and Swap
description:
Swap Hub - buy, sell and swap
Looking to sell or swap your car, phone, laptop or anything else or looking for
great deals around you?
Looking for skilled freelancers? and have no cash to pay them? No worry,
download our easy to use app and find freelancers round the globe and swap their
skills and get your work done by offering them your expertise rather than paying
them cash.
Why go to so many different classified sites and apps to find your requirement
when you can just find in one place. Access all the amazing features listed below:

Sell or swap your unwanted items quickly, straight from your phone. Ad posting is
FREE.

Log in via Facebook or Google accounts for convenience. Find verified sellers in
your neighborhood and get to discover great deals.

Manage your ads easily, directly from the app while on the move.
Chat with sellers directly to negotiate your deals from the safety of your home.
Straightforward & powerful search; Filter ads by city, brand, model, transmission,
color, registration city and much more. Swap/Exchange and free giveaway options
along with buy and sell.

Share your ads directly with your friends on social media like Facebook Instagram
and twitter.

If you have any suggestions or feedback, we would love to hear from you.

Connect with us on Facebook - facebook.com/swaphub

Tweet to us @SwapHub1

For support and queries, visit https://swaphub.net

title: Offeria (Buy & Sell)
description:
Offeria: The offer utopia!  

For all your local shopping needs.

Offeria is a free, mobile-first and unlimited digital marketplace for local goods and services bids and offers (time-free auction style).

You can easily shop online, create an offer (with photos), search offers, accept bidders, offer up and contact them for free!  You can also rate bidders and buyers.

You can browse and compare Amazon, Walmart, JCPenney and Macy's inventories on Offeria.

Locate My Friends Offeria:  You can see where your friends and family are on a map.

Ridesharing Offeria: You can see the local drivers in real time and ask for a ride.

Delivery on Demand Offeria: You can see the local deliverers and monitor your delivery in real time. This is like Uber for local deliveries!

title: Village - Buy & Sell Locally
description:
The fast, affordable & trustworthy way to buy & sell locally - Village is the market on your doorstep!

• Everything’s Local 🏡
- Village is the world's first walkable marketplace!

• Fastest Way to Sell 📷
- add your items in seconds, have them picked up in minutes!

• Discover Bargains Everyday 🎉
- only a short walk away!

• Trusted & Safe 👭
- your trusted local community already living next door!

• Save the world ♻️
- we’re coming together in a sustainable way to build a happier, stronger, greener local community!

Hope you find it helpful. We're a group of families who wanted a better and more trusted way to buy, sell & share in person with our friends, neighbours and local community - we can make a better world by re-using what we have amongst ourselves. 

Happy buying, selling & sharing - we love local! 


💸 FASTEST WAY TO SELL & MAKE MONEY 💸
• Sell or freecycle used, preloved, second-hand items
• Add a listing in seconds, just snap a photo or video to get going
• Meet nearby in person to exchange your item for cash!

🎉 DISCOVER THE BEST DEALS & BARGAINS EVERYDAY 🎉
• Find local used, preloved, second-hand bargains on Village! A car boot sale on your doorstep!
• Shop for Baby & Child, Bicycles, Community, Crafts & Art, Fashion for her, Fashion for him, Garden, Health & Beauty, Home & Furniture, Jobs, Kitchen, Mobile Phones, Music, Movies & Books, Pet Supplies, Photography & Cameras, Property, Scooters & Cars, Services, Sports & Outdoors, Tablets & Computers, Tools & DIY, Toys, TV & Audio, Video Games, Vintage & Antiques
• Buy & sell locally to save on shipping & packaging costs!

👭 THE TRUSTWORTHY & SAFE WAY TO BUY, SELL & HELP 👭
• One unified place to manage all your listings wherever you've shared them
• One trusted place to chat securely, receive offers, let people know once an item is taken and build trust
• Want to bring together your community to chat, share, buy & sell - now you can with Village Groups! Start a Village Group for your family, housemates, colleagues, classmates, fellow parents, local community centre, local park, sports club, fellow hobby enthusiasts, jumble sale, car boot sale or charity sale!
• Want to help family & friends to sell faster & better - now you can with Village Teams! Village Teams build more trust by socially verifying listings, and as every chat includes the team, they can reply to buyer’s questions and help with an exchange. Finally it’s easy to help your parents or grandparents with their local buying & selling!
• Keep your mobile number and email private

Now you can attract more customers by accepting debit & credit cards, make secure payments with fraud protection, as well as benefit from Buyer & Seller Protection on eligible sales!

Oh, and as always we’ve fixed a bunch of bugs and improved performance!

Village is built by the community - so please get in touch with more suggestions :)

title: AllGoods - Sell free, buy local
description:
AllGoods is the biggest and fastest growing app to buy and sell in New Zealand for free. Snap, list and sell your stuff for free. Browse local listings near you. Switch easily between secondhand items sold by everyday Kiwis and brand new items sold by local New Zealand businesses.

Here's why thousands of Kiwis love and use AllGoods:

IT'S FREE
- There's nothing more to say. We're all about providing a fair and modern marketplace for New Zealand.

IT'S EASY
- Snap a photo and get your items listed for sale in seconds
- Use your GPS to find thousands of listings nearby
- Make an offer by sending an in-app chat message
- Quick and easy registration
- Purchase brand new items easily through credit/debit card

IT'S SAFE
- Rate and read the feedback of buyers and sellers
- The AllGoods team constantly monitor listings and chats to prevent fraud
- AllGoods doesn't share your information with anyone
- Purchase brand-new items with buyer protection

IT'S ALLGOODS!
Download AllGoods and start selling your stuff, shopping for the best brand new products in NZ, or browsing secondhand deals nearby or far! Find anything from fashion to electronics, and books to cars!

New Zealand, it's now free for you to buy and sell. Get onboard with New Zealand's fastest growing marketplace! An e-commerce platform made by Kiwis, for Kiwis.

The AllGoods team

--- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- ---

If you have feedback or questions about AllGoods, feel free to contact us at support@allgoods.co.nz or chat with us through our in-app support chat!

comments: i love the idea of allgoods but the app itself does not have the best layout for ease of use. the categorys of items are too specific that it seems like there are no used goods within a 10k radius unless i dont search in any specific category. i have to either click through all the overly specific categorys most of which have no goods or scroll through everything thats listed at once. are there other filters for search? latest/lowest $ etc if so i cant find em. i'm 29yo in chch for reference.

This is a game changer for New Zealanders buying and selling online. Love that you can sell for free and can chat with the sellers easily. Can't believe people are still using Trademe now that I've found this. The APP works beautifully and I save so much time listing things to sell. Definitely will be my number one go to from now on.

Its good but not great. Lots of bug issues noted and only downloaded today. Unable to get app to recognise my location settings are on so therefore cannot list anything or see local listings. When you go to take a step back it bounces you right back to the home screen thus having to restart search again. When trying to list things it comes up with Rover/118 or some other number only for auto search catergory only way to actually get catergory is manually doing it.

So far i I love it, my only complaint would be that there seems to be quite a lag on it. I have to close and go back in and it works fast for like 3min then the lag kicks in again. It's the only app I have that does that. My phone is Samsung Note 8. Otherwise it's great. Super easy layout.

So far loves it, they took some of the best ideas from other popular platforms and make it super easy to use. The only complaints probably be the limited stocks, but it's still on its early days. And it's free, what more do you expect!

title: Listia: Buy, Sell, Free Stuff. Crypto Marketplace.
description:
Check out millions of FREE items other people are giving away nearby!

Buy, sell or trade anything and earn cryptocurrency in the largest mobile crypto marketplace.

Over 100 million items have been exchanged on Listia so far!

Listia is the best mobile marketplace, garage and yard sale that lets you exchange things you don't need for stuff actually want, all for FREE. Earn XNK by listing things you don't use, and turn it into stuff you'll love, like Jewelry, Electronics, Clothing, Gadgets, Books, Toys, Gift Cards, Games and Coins. The more you give and sell, the more free things you can buy without spending money.

How It Works:
1) Declutter - Sell all the things you don't use - from DVDs to Cell Phones, for free, like a mobile craigslist, yard sale or garage sale!

2) Earn Credits - Rack up XNK when others buy your listings.

3) Reward Yourself - Discover and get stuff you'll love from other members or the Listia Rewards Store!

The mobile app makes it a snap to create auctions and offer up items for sale. Simply take a photo with your device, add some details, and post it to Listia instantly. The Listia app will show you what nearby users are trading, let you buy and bid on things you want, and notify you when you're outbid or an item you want is ending.

Instead of listing things in the free section of craigslist or selling at a local garage or yard sale, give Listia a try to let go of stuff you don't need and see all the cool things you can get!

comments: Well I can't list cause it makes you verify phone number but then I never got the code ..when I kept asking to resend the code it said I exhausted all the attempts possible to contact messanger service but that page is blank no way to get help! Was very excited to try 😔

title: Flipp - Weekly Shopping
description:
Flipp helps you save up to 50% on your weekly shopping. Simple! This essential app brings you the latest weekly ads, deals, and coupons from more than 2000 of your favorite retailers including Walmart, Aldi, and CVS to help you save money. You’ll also find a variety of online offers to stay on budget. Best of all, it’s completely FREE!

This all-in-one app helps you along every step of your shopping journey, from planning to checkout, and everything in between. Find your ads, saved offers, shopping list, and loyalty cards in one place, so you don’t have to scramble at the checkout. 

Wave goodbye to inconvenient paper circulars and junk mail, and take your deal hunting on-the-go with Flipp!

Here’s why Flipp is more than just a weekly ads app:

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Useful and fairly intuitive. Would be nice if it auto-deleted Expired clipped items (you can delete it manually) or gave you the option to configure it to do so. Some flyers are more well-suited than others -- from the big chains, generally relatively easy to clip and see. For some places though where the flyers are broad-sheet sized, products shown are miniscule -- so it's hard to see a product, let alone clip it. Not sure if there's anything Flipp can do about that. Zooming in is really painful and not really worth the time.

This app is exceptional!!! I love love love this app you can't go wrong by downloading this app you'll have the sales ads at the tip of your fingers on your phone all day every day! I'm in love with the 'LIST' section you add what you need to buy and the app will pull up all the sales at all the nearby stores in your area! DON'T DELAY DOWNLOAD TODAY!!!

This is a really great app. Super convenient. I love being able to put my loyalty cards in it too, but am holding back one star because there isn't a way to add a card unless the store is already in their loyalty list. So I have cards from smaller retailers that I have to still carry.

While scrolling through the flyers, tapping on certain items, the page would not display clearly. A different display of another item would appear. When I try to correct the problem, the entire page would be unclear. Basically it would show a collage of ads. I prefer looking through the (old fashioned) paper flyer.

Aside from the convenience of every flyer at your fingertips, I absolutely love the search feature. If I have to buy an item on a tight budget any given week, it's great knowing that I can compare all the local ads for it and buy where its the best price!

title: Hollar - The Online Dollar Store
description:
Bring the fun and addicting dollar store experience straight to your phone! Find thousands of amazing deals across our wide selection of categories with 50-90% off retail! Join our growing user base of over 5 million savvy shoppers and start saving today!

Reasons to Download:

App-Exclusive Deals 
Get instant access to app-only promotions and deals on thousands of top brands starting at $1—the lowest online prices, guaranteed!

Browsing Made Simple
Enjoy infinite scrolling for an effortless browsing experience. Looking for something specific? Quick search to find what you need, when you need it. 

Buy with Confidence
Securely check out with your credit card or PayPal and experience fast domestic shipping—straight from our fulfillment center in Los Angeles, CA.


What We Offer:

Endless Variety
Shop popular products in Home, Kitchen, Toys, Beauty, Office, Apparel, Household, Health, Grocery, Baby, Party, Pet, Electronics, and so much more!

All Your Favorite Brands
So many products from Disney, Nickelodeon, Star Wars, Marvel, Minions, Shopkins, My Little Pony, TONYMOLY, e.l.f., Nivea, Neutrogena, O.P.I., Crayola, Mega Bloks, Play-Doh, Cotton On, Hanes, Fruit of the Loom, Zak!—to name a few.

New Products Daily
Get them before they’re gone! New products are available daily at low, LOW prices. Check back daily to find something new.

Fast Shopping with Bundles
Easily add related products to your cart with our bundles. It’s a simpler, more streamlined way to shop and discover.

comments: Absolutely love this app. They have good discounts on great products and fast delivery. they can't be beat. 6 months later and still loving it. I order at least once a month. They have anything you could need at an affordable price. Free shipping is offered once you spend a certai amount. If not it's only 3.99. What else could you ask for?Trust me when i say try it, you will love it. I need VIP status guys. Maybe a special discount. I have every person that I know and encoun wl

App started out decent, until i sent a couple emails re: a couple products that vanished, they never replied back, then they sent a message that my account has 5.00 credit to use on next purchase, but it didnt show in my account, i sent them a screenshot of the message, and 1 week later they respond with: send us the message that you recieved, i replied: already did that! No response back from them..
The app used to work great now it lags and my cart takes forever to load. Theres always an error message. Please fix because I used to buy from Hollar all the time. Samsung Note Plus
The app is really amazing. I really love this app. I ordered some products from this app and all products are really of good quality. Fully worth of money.

I found hollar when they first started and wow i got amazing things for an amazing price and yes prices go up with stores but hollar has got even better!There toy bundles rock and yes in the process of trying to teach austic grandson to go to the potty and yes its been so hard to do and i hope he goes so he can pick a toy out of the POTTY FUN PRIZE BOX we made from the things we bought fr this store!great app,great prices and nice toys

title: VarageSale: Sell simply, buy safely.
description:
VarageSale is your virtual garage sale buy and sell app. We are the only app based on 100% real identity--everyone goes through a manual review process before they’re allowed to buy or sell. See member ratings and average response times to get to know people before a sale. Messaging members and scheduling meetups are a breeze through our app.

Browse local classifieds listings on the feed or filter out categories you aren’t interested in for a personalized shopping experience. Easily search for stuff like baby gear, furniture, household items, electronics, jewelry, purses, clothing, shoes, and more! 
 
Got stuff to sell? Take a photo and list it in seconds. Earn extra cash. Let go of items you no longer want or need. 
 
Completely free to buy, sell, browse and bump your stuff to the top of the listings feed. 
 
Skip yard sales. VarageSale instead! Sell simply, buy safely.

111 Peter Street
Suite 901
Toronto, Ontario, Canada
M5V 2H1
recentChanges:
* You can now clear all your watched items
* Performance improvements and various fixes

Send your suggestions, comments or questions to the team at help@varagesale.com.
comments: Edit: 2.24.20- The app has SO many issues lately! Nothing will load multiple times a day, I'm not receiving notifications half the time for messages or Interests in my items. Absolutely causing issues for sales and buys. I was obsessed and impressed with the app for a very long while. I'm almost over it now with all the issues!

I love this app for many reasons! 1) I can sell my unwanted items without leaving the house. 2) I can buy an item without having to wait in line at a store; too many times it took so long that I just put the item back and left. 3) Porch pick up (PPU) is great, especially if you have kids! 4) Last but not least, you get to meet great people and be part of a good community!

I love this app, find it useful for finding great local deals! It would be better if the messages showed up right away instead of only when the page is physically refreshed or restarted, and if the search engine would have filters, search within price range etc. Still would reccomend to friends though.

Nice to have a place to buy good used items. But it's very frustrating if you forget your password login. I did and clicked to send email to reset several times and didn't get email to reset. I finally figured out my password on my own. Now I have no notifications updating on the app. Nothing new showing in the last 24 hours?!

I absolutely love love love this App. It's the best way to get rid of your unwanted clutter. It's all local and would recommend this app to everyone. Also if you are looking to purchase things, they have just about anything you can think of. And the people are very friendly.

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Great app. Great concept. Just wish there was a search option without having to buy something first so I don't have to wade through things I have no interest in.

I love this app, and I understand the point is to outbid people, but I find it hard to take items from other's. I have found that if you set reminders the app will let you know when you can bid again. If you miss the bidding opportunity, they usually offer you the item at a base amount. That amount is usually less than what you would have bid, so for that reason if something is going twice I try not to take items from other's. My time always comes around. Common courtesy goes a long way. JS

Fun and exciting app, unfortunately most everything (ALL) comes from CHINA. I found even if it says USA it ships from overseas 😥. I also found the app locks till you pay for item won so you can't bid on anything else. App is slow to show details of item, also what you see in the picture is not always what you get so read the details first. Clothes are Chinese sizes so if your a size 16 /18 Us that's a 5x large or xxxxxL becareful on this site.

Fun (free to bid) Pay if you win Auction Site. New stuff daily. Auctions start every 90 seconds. all kinds of items from electronics, jewelry, home and hobby, premium, fashion and beauty. title: Mercari: The Selling App

NOT USING IT? SELL IT. SHIP IT. GET PAID.

This is Mercari. The fast and easy way to sell (or buy) almost anything. Fashion to toys. Sporting goods to electronics. All the brands you know and love. Got stuff you don’t use, never used or simply outgrew? Sell it.

comments: Love this app. Shopping and selling items are easy. Only negative I've experienced is that They are overly aggressive on monitoring every aspect of communication between the seller and buyer, so just keep that in mind. Also when you first start off selling, be aware that you must figure out your exact shipping costs before you price an item. I offered to sell a baby doll bed for $10 and was told by USPS that it would cost $99 to ship to the other side of country due to the dimensions of the box.

I really like Mercari for selling stuff! It's easy to use. I've sold two things so far, but my issue is that my listings dont show up when I go to my profile and click the Selling tab on the app... It's annoying because I get the "Action Required" notification but it takes me to a page where it says I have no listing and no in-progress sales. I have to go on my computer to look at my listings. I really hope this gets fixed.

Love this app. I have a lot of makeup and clothes I'm not going to use so this app is awesome for selling those kind of things and everything really! I've sold all sorts of items. Never had an issue with receiving my funds. In my experience mercari has been great with handling any issues I've had as a buyer and seller. Love the changes they've made to the app but there still are some things that could improve.

3/21/20 Update: The app, on any device, will not load my messages and this has been going on for almost 2 months. I've been using the app for 3 years now, and it is kind of ridiculous that my messages won't load on any device. I am an IT specialist, and have gone through every known protocol. Have reinstalled numerous times, reset and tried diff connections (data/wifi/etc), and reset device settings. Seems as of you are intentionally disallowing my messages to be opened. Please resolve this.

Great as a buyer, ok as a seller. Mercari tries to get you to price things as low as possible. They also automatically have a feature turned on that lowers the price with views. So your item will Bottom out fast. So as a buyer you are getting awesome deals but it's not as great as a seller. Also the $2 fee to cash out is a bit ridiculous in this day and age. I already paid a fee on what I was paid for the item and now I have to pay again to have MY money.

title: Poshmark - Buy & Sell Fashion
description:
Poshmark is the leading marketplace to buy and sell fashion.

***Shop over 5,000 brands in every size—including plus size, petites and juniors— at up to 70% off retail
***Sell and turn your closet into cash. List your items for free!

40-70% OFF EVERYTHING
Find discounts on trendy fashion, shoes, beauty, jewelry, watches, accessories, handbags, mens fashion, kids fashion, or anything on your wish list! 

FAST SHIPPING
All Poshmark orders are shipped using expedited USPS Priority Mail. Once your seller ships, your order will be delivered in 1-3 business days. 

Shop, sell, party.

SHOP
Whatever you’re shopping for, Poshmark’s got it—for much less than at discount clothing retailers and outlet malls. With over a million dollars worth of new and gently used merchandise added to the marketplace daily, you'll find amazing fashion and beauty products from today's hottest brands, like Nike, Adidas, Lululemon Athletica, Michael Kors, Louis Vuitton, Gucci, Christian Louboutin, Coach, Kate Spade, Tory Burch, Express, Anthropologie, Free People, Birkenstock, Converse, Vans, Supreme, and more! 

STYLE
Need ideas for what to wear to your next date or that upcoming wedding? Do you hate getting dressed in the morning? Poshmark has millions of of outfit ideas for you. Shop the personal style and closets of other Poshers today!

SELL
Do you have items in your closet that didn’t work out? Maybe a designer handbag, statement shoes, or even your old wedding dress you wore once and won’t ever wear again? Poshmark is the #1 online consignment solution to to sell your unwanted clothing and buy new things you love, providing an alternative to consignment stores that only offer pennies on the dollar. 1 in 50 American women have their closets open for sale on Poshmark—you could be next!

PARTY
Party on the go, no matter where you are! Join the thousands of women who come together every day to participate in our themed virtual Posh Parties. You can browse, buy, and even list with your friends. With a wide variety of themes and brands, there's a Posh Party for everyone!

FASHION & BEAUTY
Women’s Fashion: athleisure, swimwear, dresses, jackets, bottoms, tops, sweaters, shoes, sandals, heels, plus size, maternity   
Men’s Fashion: jackets, sweaters, shirts, button-ups, workout wear, dri-fit, tech fleece, hoodies, joggers 
Kids’ Fashion: shirts, bottoms, shoes, socks, baby clothes, toddler and youth sizes
Accessories: purses, handbags, belts, jewelry, watches, travel bags, backpacks, hats, sunglasses, wallets 
Beauty: lipstick, eyeshadow palettes, foundation, concealer, blush, highlighter, eyeliner, bb cream, cc cream, powder 
Shoes: sandals, sneakers, heels, boots, mules, wedges, ankle boots, espadrilles, flats

Don’t waste another precious moment with other discount fashion retailers or consignment solutions. Poshmark will change the way you shop for clothing and fashion. Try us out today!

comments: Great app, been using since 2012-ish, and they have made major & minor tweaks along the way, but most recently I've found it difficult to physically create new listings, even with the help of Posh tech support; they definitely raised shipping prices, you can't make an offer to likers without also choosing to pay 1 of 2 shipping costs, so you can't make offer on items +/=$6 or it results in negative payment; & lastly, charging buyers tax on items I'd already paid taxes on in the past. Double dip.

I love this app. Genius!!! Everyone on this site seem to be a higher caliber than other sites. My questions about items are always promptly answered, the items are in great shape. The coolest thing is being able to find things from your past (example: Vision streetwear clothing). or discontinued colors for fav make up items. Literally bought my wedding dress on poshmark. Awesome site. Great app!

I love this app. But unfortunately I messed up and I inadvertently deleted it by mistake when trying to delete an unused app. I realized what I did, and reloaded the app. Now I lost my likes in my profile area even though other things are kept and the teck is screwing with me. It won' let me do anything. I can't comment, ask questions or reach out to anyone. I have a credit with Posh, and everything. Help I'm having major problems, and I wanted to buy something too? Now what do I do?

Need better sales reports to include transfers. App has been sharing extremely slower than normal lately. For days, if not weeks now! Can you please add a sort feature for shared last and oldest listings? It would help when there are these issues with sharing. Would make sharing and updating older inventory a whole lot easier and less daunting for larger closets when you have to scroll all the way to bottom over and over. Also, adding photos all at once would be nice as in other apps. Thanks!

App works perfectly for buying and selling, no issues there. However, when asked to go through reported items & review them, after I make and select a decision, and it moves on to the next reported item, the app still shows the previous reported item and its info, but the bottom part changes. The only way to get to the next reported item is to back completely out back to notifications screen, otherwise it will continue to only show that first reported item.

title: Wendy’s – Food and Offers
description:
Get exclusive offers, find the closest Wendy’s, use mobile pay and explore the menu to find out what makes Wendy’s deliciously different.

We’re working hard to make mobile ordering available in your area! So, be on the lookout and the next time you’re hungry, pull out your phone and give it a whirl.

FEATURES 
• Get exclusive, in-app-only offers.
• Load your gift card into the app and never forget it–or wonder what your balance is–again. 
• Get nutrition info for all your Wendy’s faves
• No cash? No problem! Load funds and pay for your meal right from your phone
• Quickly answer one of life’s most important questions: where’s your nearest Wendy’s?
• Tell us your order without ever opening your mouth when you order on the app. 
• Support the Dave Thomas Foundation’s mission to find foster children forever homes and give back for adoption.

We always love hearing from you. Feel free to hit us up at customercare@wendys.com and let us know what’s on your mind.

For details on the personal information Wendy’s collects and the purposes for its collection, visit here: https://www.wendys.com/privacy-policy. For California consumers, you can find information about your CCPA rights and how to exercise them here: https://www.wendys.com/privacy-policy#CCPA.

comments: The app works fine for me. Haven't had any issues. However, I would rate it higher and probably use it more often if there wasn't the ridiculously annoying blank notifications that come up about every 3-5 minutes that won't let you clear them, you can only minimize. I can place an order and for the rest of the day periodically get these black notifications. I'd rather just wait to order till I get to the restaurant.

The app works fine but there needs to be a lot of improvements. In order to use a offer, have to manually put everything listed in the offer exact word for word. Would be better to click only once. When you pay for it, took me about 5 minutes to figure out how. When you click pay, there's 3 words like "add card and Wendys digital pay" all clumped together. Later found out they were choices. Should be some button layout. It looks like just 1 big button instead of 3 seperate button choices.

Using the app is easy and mobile ordering is great however when you change or add condiments they are completely ignored. For example I asked for no mayo due to an allergy but for extra ketchup and pickles. I received my Baconator with more mayo than anything, barely a teaspoon of ketchup and no pickles very disappointed. I did not have time to go back thru the drive thru to have them correct my order since I am only allowed a 30 minute lunch break and already had used 15 minutes.

App was working fine around the new breakfast launch time. Now I can't even place an order. Always gives me an error about credit card info when i've been using the same card ever since, no changes. Tried multiple cards and got the same error. There needs to be a better tender system otherwise app is useless. Uninstalling until fix. Still love the grub though😘

The app is poorly designed and crashes often. Placing orders is a really frustrating experience as it often runs into a problem, but doesn't tell you what the issue is. DO NOT ADD GIFT CARDS TO THE APP. This will completely transfer the balance of the card to the app. If your gift card has less than the value of your order, you cannot spend the balance of the gift card. And you cannot remove the gift card from the app to use the physical gift card again. Wendy's needs to figure out a way where gift cards can spend their remaining balance on a card and charge the rest to a credit card. The only decent thing about the app is that they have some decent coupons on there that I like to use often.

title: Cheap Cars For Sale, Find or Sell Yours
description:
Cheap Cars Finder APP is a search platform developed to help people with low budget to find affordable used cars, trucks, SUVs, pickups, and minivans for sale in USA near they live.

Over 1-MILLION downloads...! Thank you! =D

If you’re selling cars at a low price, i.e. under $1000, $2000 or for less than $5000, feel free to post FREE CLASSIFIED ADS for an unlimited time. Process is pretty easy, on just one page and previous sign up isn’t required. Only requisite is one photo of the car and your ad will be automatically approved. Dealerships welcome.

CAR FINDERS
What you need to know before using the app

Real cheap cars? 1st thing you need to know is that app doesn’t do miracles. If you’re searching for used cars in "like-new" condition for $5000 or less and 1-3 years old, this isn’t the app to find them.

App's purpose is helping users to find used cars from $1000 up to $5000, which is our price range for cheap cars, but please, keep in mind that some cars at these prices may need some work, have normal wear or high mileage, even though, we can assure that, according to their sellers, many of them run well and for some that’s enough.

Also, although APP encourages sellers to post cars for sale on this price range, it isn't mandatory or forced. Keep also in mind that CHEAP is an ambiguous/subjective word that relies on the budget and overall condition of the car, having the last word, a personal test drive and inspection, things that APP hasn’t a way to do by itself.

APP requests to sellers to post as much as they can detailed information about the overall condition of cars so buyers may have an idea if it worth the price or not, but again, a personal test drive will have the last word. Never pay money for a car you haven’t tested/checked by yourself first. You can also always contact the seller to request more information which is the correct way to start the negotiation.

Low inventory.  APP isn’t a Silicon Valley-funded and service is totally FREE, so budget to market it across the country is limited. Some users complain about the low inventory and we understand and apologize about it, so please, give it some time, we're trying as much as we can to make it known and discoverable. APP doesn’t use automatic data feeds provided by street dealerships and their marketing networks which is the way bigger car finder apps work to provide millions of listings. Cheap Cars Finder APP relies more on used cars posted by their owners, at lower or cheaper prices that dealers may not be able to offer. 

Just give it a try, if you find something you like it, awesome! but if you don’t, you can try another site/APP, that’s how searching online works. Whining, retaliating or leaving a negative review, doesn’t help at all.

Outdated ads. A common issue among sellers is they forget to remove their cars once they’re sold given that APP allows to list them for unlimited time (some fixer-upper cars needs more than the usual time to get sold), so that’s why we do really appreciate that you use the [REPORT AD] option in case you find a sold car instead of leaving a negative review. Reporting helps more.

APP FEATURES

♣ Find cheap cars by zip code (distance), make & model, body style, USA state or price range
♣ Post and manage multiple used cars on same account
♣ Sort search results by distance, price, year, mileage, model, etc
♣ Receive instant notifications sent by possible buyers
♣ Dark layout good for your eyes and phone battery life
♣ Expandable images (zoom-in-out)
♣ Seller tools to check stats, edit profile, remove/edit ads, etc
♣ Share best deals with friends

Autopten.com © 2007-2019
http://www.autopten.com

Objective and constructive reviews are welcome and appreciated.

Join our social channels of over 100K car sellers and buyers:

FB:
https://facebook.com/cheapcarsunder1000/
https://facebook.com/cheapcarsunder2000/
https://facebook.com/cheapcarsforsale/

comments: Fan-Freaking-Tastic! I love this app! It definitely more than delivers on it's promise & they're not just offering a bunch of lemons! If you're in need of Any Type of motor vehicle, at a bargain price, & you're not looking to simply buy someone else's problems to drive into the ground, I suggest you look here 1st...

Does what it says. Mostly cheap used cars for sale by private parties. Just be careful, read the listing descriptions before getting in touch. Some of the vehicles need you to spend some money on them. Owners arent willing to do it, thats probably why many of them are dirt cheap.

Among the many apps available to search for cars in the US, probably this one isnt the best but is one of the few that let everyone posting vehicles for sale, hassle-free, at no cost, and for an unlimited time.
Overall it's easy to navigate and loads quickly enough. Very easy to search for exactly what you want. Save your favorite vehicle and check them later.
Basic app. Simple and easy to find the car you want for the best possible price. Not all but most ads have good quality zoomable pictures.
