title: BarterBay: Buy - Sell - Trade for everyone
description:
Sell your stuff or find the best offer!
Everyone has used items lying around at home, e.g. second hand clothes, played games, used electronics or furniture. Why not sell stuff or trade them for more useful things? You can also find great offers posted by other people!

Barter Bay provides an online trading platform where you can buy, sell and trade for free. We connect you to real people both locally and globally. By using Barter Bay, you can save money and declutter at the same time. ☀️ What’s more, it’s completely free!

Reduce Waste, Greener environment 🌱
Wait! Are you sure you want to throw that away?
Many discarded items are still in good condition, but are thrown away because their owners have no need for them anymore. This creates unnecessary waste for the environment, filling up our landfills. If you buy, sell, trade or barter used stuff, you are giving these items a second lease of life and saving the planet. One man's trash is another man's treasure! 🎁 

Features
_________

1. 📸Sell your items easily: Just snap a photo, give a description, and post!

2. 💬An innovative chat and trading deck system makes it simple and fun to buy and sell.

3. 🌟Get rewarded with gift cards when you sell items and refer friends.

4. 📍Browse by location and categories such as clothing, electronics, home etc.

5. 🔍Search for specific items that you want.

6. 👁️See what others are looking for in return for their items.

7. 📝Easily keep track of ongoing offers, and view your trade history.

How is Barter Bay different from other buy and sell apps?
Simple to use, completely free
There are no complicated price systems, or excessive push notifications. Just post a photo to sell an item, and chat to buy when you find something you like.

Trading Deck
Trade your item for another! Our innovative trading deck allows you to look at your items and your trading partner’s items side by side. Add them to the deck, and make an offer! The other party can accept your offer, or make you a counter offer. Organize your trades by decks. Want cash instead? Set a price! You can add a price to the items that you want to sell, or set them as Negotiable. 

Designated trading locations
Want a safe place to meet? We have partnered with local cafes and restaurants to provide safe trading locations. Look out for our Barter Bay Designated Trading Location stickers, or view the list of locations in the app!

Collect bbCoins and get rewarded
bbCoins are points that you can collect when you post items and refer friends to join Barter Bay. You can use them to redeem for free shopping and coffee gift cards! We are always adding new ways to earn points, and more exciting rewards, so check back often!


Download and start bartering now!
We all have something stashed in a corner of our home, waiting for the day when it would come into use, and sometimes forgetting about them. Or we receive something new, but the old item is still too good to be thrown away. With Barter Bay, you can buy, sell and trade with real people in your community. All you need to do is to take a photo of what you want to trade or sell, write a description and pick your preferred location to meet. You can shop great deals from others too!

title: RetailMeNot: Coupons, Deals & Discounts

Save money on everything you want with RetailMeNot! It's never been easier to find great deals on clothes, shoes, beauty, food and more for the stores and restaurants you love.

The award-winning RetailMeNot app makes saving money easy and fun with over 200,000+ offers including 19,000+ in-store coupons from more than 15,000+ brands. The app also features hundreds of cash back offers so you can easily save on everything you want.

Fashion coupon - Macy’s, Target, Kohl’s, Amazon

MANAGE YOUR PROFILE & NOTIFICATION - You can view or edit your profile information on Desidime app. We send you Notifications whenever a New Front Page Deal (FPD) or Mega sale is live. You can also manage these notifications from this section.
 
As India's largest online shopping community DesiDime has advantages over coupon sites like Coupondunia, Grabon, Cashkaro which are only coupon & deal sites.

To narrow your results, you can filter these lists by Groups to view specific Electronics offers, Online food order offers, Mobiles offers, Grocery offers, flight offers , hotel booking deals , free recharge coupons , fashion discounts deals , freebies, computers & laptops deals, Buy1 Get 1 Offers etc. To view offers from specific online stores, you can also use the store filters present on our app. Also get all Diwali Offers, Diwali coupons, Diwali Sale & deals in one place.

BROWSE EXCLUSIVE, ACTIVE & FEATURED COUPONS – On DesiDime app Browse these lists for the active & updated list of coupons from various online stores. Whether you are booking your hotel & flight ticket, shopping for your next mobile phone, buying jeans and tops or simply ordering your meal online, we have got coupons for everything to help you save a little more on your online shopping. Copy paste the coupon code to apply it & get an extra discount. You can get recharge coupon codes, offers and coupons for bill payment and many coupons in India


BROWSE STORE SPECIFIC OFFERS - When you want to look for deals & coupons from an online store on our app, you simply need to select the store name. We list the Best Deals & Coupons from over 1000+ Indian online shopping stores such as Flipkart, Amazon India, Jabong, eBay India, Snapdeal, Myntra, Freecharge, Paytm, Cleartrip, Yatra, Jabong, Abof, Shopclues, Tatacliq, Pepperfry and many more. Also get deals offers from Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale & Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale

JOIN THE SHOPPING COMMUNITY ON FORUMS - Join our active online shopping community on forums to discuss everything from hot deals, daily deals, freebies & contests, reviews of product & online shopping websites and more on our app.

MANAGE YOUR PROFILE & NOTIFICATION - You can view or edit your profile information on Desidime app. We send you Notifications whenever a New Front Page Deal (FPD) or Mega sale is live. You can also manage these notifications from this section.

As India's largest online shopping community DesiDime has advantages over coupon sites like Coupondunia, Grabon, Cashkaro which are only coupon & deal sites.

We’re always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions or concerns for our app, please add them in the reviews section or email us on admin@desidime.com

Happy Shopping :)

title: Local - Buy & Sell
description:
Local - Buy & Sell is a free to use app that has as its main goal "helping local artists buy & sell" This doesn't mean you won't find other useful stuff in here. So go ahead and download the app, recommend it to your friends & best of all let us know how we can improve.

Help us out by spreading the word! This app doesn't charge any fee's to the sellers or the buyers. We will try to keep this business method as long as possible!

Remember to always use payment methods that allow you to recover your money in case of an incident.

We recommend cash on delivery. Happy Shopping :)

title: AppSales: Paid Apps Gone Free & On Sale
description:
AppSales offers an easy, convenient way to find and download the best apps and games on sale or free for a limited time. Personalize your experience with advanced filter options, monitor app prices and discover the latest sales and trending apps.

✔ *NEW* Discover paid apps that are free for a limited time

Google recently made it possible for developers to make their paid apps available for free for a short time which wasn’t possible before. Our new “Now Free” tab highlights those deals so you can grab those apps while the offer lasts. 

✔ App price monitoring has never been this easy!

Feature overview:
• Modern, intuitive user interface (Material 2.0 Design)
• Constantly updated list of sales
• Get notified about the new best sales on the Google Play Store and apps gone free
• Only the hottest apps, games, and wallpapers
• A price history provides transparency, allowing you to compare prices over time as well
• Dismiss apps you're not interested in
• Search for your new favorite apps and add them to your Watchlist
• Advanced filter options to personalize your experience
• Sync your Watchlist across multiple Android devices
• Share sales with your family and friends
• Dark Theme / Night mode

✔ Your Personal Watchlist
Add apps, games, and wallpapers to your personal Watchlist and receive a notification once the app goes on sale. 

✔ Price History
A Price History lets you easily view the min, the max, and the average price during the last 60 days (360 for Premium user). Validate sales and detect price-patterns to save money by purchasing an app at the best time, usually during a price drop on the Google Play Store.

✔ Watchlist Charts
Grouped into 3 sections (Last 48 hours, last 30 days and 1 Year) you can easily discover brand new trending apps or the most popular paid apps.

✔ Advanced Filter Options
Use filters to personalize the list of sales by defining your minimum discount-, download-, watchcount- and rating threshold. You can also choose to hide apps with ads or in-app purchases.

✔ Dismiss Apps
Dismiss apps you already own or you’re not interested in and they won’t show up the next time they are on sale.

✔ Categories
Not interested in apps of certain categories (e.g. Games or Wallpapers)? No problem, you can disable notifications for specific categories or completely hide them from your sale list. 

✔ Customizable Highlights Section
Set up filter, specify categories, blacklist certain app types and developers to get a list of sales you’re interested in.

Why Should I Download AppSales Best Apps On Sale? (tl;dr)
AppSales lets you discover the best apps and games on sale thanks to our advanced filter and customization options. Other functions, like a price monitor or Watchlist Charts, makes AppSales an all-in-one solution for apps gone free deals and offers.


Suggestions? Feedback? Leave us a comment or rating in the Google Play Store or contact us at: info@app-sales.net

Please note: Actual prices may vary depending on your location and currency.

comments: I like this app however missing sorting options(price or discount), group or filter to apps or games (if it is an option to do), discount tab shows 100% free ones as well which have separate tab. However still a better browsing experience than play store. Yes I found the filter on main tab which is pretty handy but it is far from ideal. Still a great app though.

I would like to have the option to receive notifications only about true free apps and games, and filter them for the most stared ones as well as the option to sort the apps by stars and by original price in order to filter the junk, unuseful apps. Noticed that not all of the apps on Google's Play store are searchable. Also, an AMOLED theme can never harm an app. I will update the review as soon as these crutial features get their way to the app and when you reply to me so I notice.

One of those very useful software applications in the apps store . I use it every day and it's quite addictive. I like the way you place your ads. Non obtrusive ethically placed ads. Now I'm using my phone like a Pro.!

Pre-Material dress-up was smooth/faster. Highlights- Now Free- Sales, bottom location, select option is close enough to Android navigation bar that it can be frustrating! "Material Design" bandwagon had done your app no favors.
The best app of its kind on Google Play. When I install others like this one I compare them to this one! Kudos to the developers for all of the $$ you have saved me!

title: JCPenney
description:
Find the best online shopping deals, rewards and coupons on your phone - it’s easy! Find exclusive discounts and shop women's clothes, shoes, home and much more with JCPenney.

So whether you’re searching for discounts on women's clothes, housewares or even a gift card for someone special, at JCPenney you’re guaranteed to find offers you want, at prices you love. This is online shopping made easy!

Deals on clothes, fun rewards and more! 
5 ways JCPenney will help you find the products you love for less!

1. Online shopping deals - browse discounts on women's clothes, shoes, bedding & more.
2. Rewards & offers - You can use our FREE rewards program via the app.
3. Coupons - Save coupons to your wallet and use in-app or in-store.
4. Gift card - Got a JCPenney gift card? Apply it to your purchase in just a few steps.
5. Shop & Collect - Buy items in the app and pick them up the same day from a nearby store.

SHOP & SAVE
Don’t miss out on our amazing shopping deals! Save coupons to your wallet and use the coupons when shopping in-app or show the barcodes to any JCPenney associate to apply them to your order. Easy!

ONLINE SHOPPING
Our Price Check feature lets you scan barcodes in store to learn more. You can also use our Snap to Shop feature to take a picture of your favorite items and we’ll find similar products that you can shop instantly via the app.

GIFT CARD, REWARDS & OFFERS
Not only are your coupons and offers just a swipe or tap away but now you can also save them to your wallet! Manage your gift card or access offers straight from your phone.

CLOTHES, SHOES & MORE
Find all the women's clothes, shoes, makeup, and housewares you want easily with our modern design. You can even buy products directly in the app and then pick them up in store.

HOME, FURNITURE & BEDDING
Shop home decór, beautiful bedding and stunning furniture right here, at JCPenney. Whether you’re looking for new statement furniture or want to redecorate your home, you can find the perfect accessories in home, furniture and bedding. 

Want to stay up to date with the hottest deals? Don’t worry, we’ve got you! Opt-in to be one of the first customers to get notified via push notifications or the in-app inbox of the latest promotions, discounts, offers, and shopping events going on at JCPenney. From clothes to jewelry to home goods we’ll make sure you don’t miss discounts and deals!

JCPenney Credit Card
Managing your JCPenney credit card is now easier than ever with our app! Now you can easily view your balance, pay your bill, and see offers just for JCPenney credit cardholders.

We love feedback! Love the JCPenney App? Please consider leaving us a 5-star rating! Questions or comments? Please use the App Feedback section in the app. We’d love to hear about your experience.

Download the JCPenney app today to get the latest offers on clothes, makeup, home goods, and more!

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

title: Recharge Plans, DTH Plans, Offers, Cashback
description:
iReff is the most trusted brand in India when it comes to prepaid mobile recharge information. App provides many value added services like live balance, Recharge reminder, online recharge options etc for all telecom operators covering all circles in India. DTH plans are also available now!

Mobile Recharge Assistant:
Before you recharge your prepaid mobile, find the best recharge plan/pack for your exact need. iReff app is the fastest and easiest way to find the recharge plan you need and buy it through our online recharge partners. Browse through the common benefit categories - Topup, SMS, Data (4G/3G/2G), Local, STD, ISD. Or try the powerful full-text search feature to find recharge plans matching your specific need or for price/plan comparison.

Mobile plan description shows FTT, Extra talk time(Full TT+), Local, STD, 2G, 3G, 4G, Roaming, NIGHT packs, Validity plans, Recharge type, Self Activation codes, FRCs and a Special warning to alert users for conditional recharges.

DTH recharge with exciting deals available for Tata Sky, Airtel DTH, Dish TV, Reliance Big TV DTH, Videocon D2H & Sun TV DTH. It also supports DTH activation & online recharge option.

You can also find commonly used USSD / SMS codes for checking the balance and remaining benefits. Want to contact the operator customer care? We got that covered too.

Find all latest tariff plans for all networks/operators, Find latest Reliance Jio recharge offers and plans details here.
Get amazing discounts and cash back on all recharge transactions & much more.
	
Mobile Recharge Plans:
You can find details about Topup Vouchers, Special Tariff Vouchers (STV), Combo Vouchers and Full Talk Time offers. If you are looking for plans to help a friend, just share it from the app in a beautiful format. Mobile retailers also find it very useful to answer customer recharge queries. 

Manage Mobile Subscription:
We maintain your complete recharge history in one place and remind you when it is time to recharge. Users can also check the live balance of talk time and can track consumption. Reliance Jio users can track data balance all the time.
Recharge plan data is updated daily for all operators, based on what is published on the operator website. 

Mobile Online Recharge:
Buy the selected recharge plan through our online recharge partner Paytm. Apart from changing list of recharge options, you can also get all the latest cashback offers for recharge & personal offers in the app. 

Save Money, Make Money!

	★ All plans are shown sorted by value so users can pick the best!, Users can also sort all plans by relevance (default), Validity and Price. Users can also compare plans and find the best plans for their usage pattern.

	★ Mobile Recharge Offers, promo codes, Coupons available from our partners Paytm, Mobikwik & others.

	★ Offers: Personal offers section under Offers will show SIM personal offers from the operator. Recharge Offers: All our recharge partner offers from Paytm is shown here.

	★ Deals: We are showing some of the popular online deals for mobile devices, accessories & popular categories.

We currently support information across all applicable telecom circles for:
* Airtel
* Aircel
* BSNL / MTNL
* Idea
* Reliance Jio
* MTS
* Reliance 4G
* Reliance GSM
* Tata Docomo GSM
* Tata Docomo CDMA
* T24
* Uninor
* Vodafone

We are continuously making improvements and feature additions. Please keep your app updated to the latest version. In case of any problems or suggestions please email us at care@ireff.in

For all help related to app and features refer to  http://help.ireff.in

The app may show ads from Facebook. See https://m.facebook.com/ads/ad_choices for more details. Clicking on such ads will not give you any reward whatsoever.

This app uses Accessibility services.

title: vouchercloud: deals & offers
description:
Get the best savings and offers for your favourite restaurants, high-street stores, supermarkets and brands straight to your phone with the award winning free vouchercloud app. vouchercloud lets you search for the best savings near you and delivers money-saving vouchers that you can use at restaurants, high-street shops, days out, leisure, entertainment and much more.

There's also a huge range of online shopping vouchers and codes so you can save on anything from the latest tech gadgets to the current fashion must haves as well as your weekly shop.

Used by more than six million customers across the globe, featured as a Top lifestyle App and rated as one of the best 500 apps in the world by The Sunday Times, we’ve saved our customers millions since we launched in 2010.


APP MAIN FEATURES:

★ Restaurant deals

vouchercloud brings you fantastic discounts from the best local restaurants in town. Get money off offers and discount deals from great Italian restaurants like Pizza Express, ASK, Strada and Bella Italia or if you fancy something different get pizza vouchers for Pizza Hut, 25% off Frankie & Benny's, a  BOGOF deal at Fayre & Square or go for super Spanish savings at La Tasca. 

★ Fashion offers

At vouchercloud we don't just find you discounts for going out, we'll help you look amazing when you do go out. Get in-store and online fashion vouchers for men and women's fashion from top clothing and jewellery brands such as Nike, Jack Wills, New Look, asos, Sports Direct, Hinds, Marks and Spencer, John Lewis, Bonmarché, Sports Direct, Next and Ted Baker.

★ Offers near you

vouchercloud helps you find the best local offers near and around you. We focus on getting you the best possible deal at the right discounted price and we make sure you get them from top quality brands and outlets. 

★ Travel deals

We have searched high and low for the best travel deals. Using our free voucher app will help you get Exclusive coupons from Purple Parking so you don't have to spend a fortune when you park up to go on holiday. What's more, you can also get Thomas Cook coupons as well as First Choice holiday offers. We've got money vouchers at Disney World and hotel bargains from Riu Hotel & Resorts, QHotels and Travelodge.

★ Top technology

With vouchercloud you don't have to wait until Black Friday, we get you money off coupons and great UK discounts for the best gadgets all year round

★ Fun stuff

Getting great deals isn’t all about fashion, tech and travel, we have exclusive passes to Now TV, Microsoft Office deals, free Sky broadband, trainline, The National Trust, livingsocial, Amazon and Virgin Wines. Browse through our categories to get all the latest discount vouchers.

★ INFORMATION: 

vouchercloud is the No.1 money saving platform, delivering savings every day from your favourite brands. Our website and FREE app have the most amount of vouchers and offers available in over 18 different countries.

Keep in touch with vouchercloud by mailing us on hello@vouchercloud.com or through social media as below:

Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/vouchercloud 
Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/vouchercloud

title: Nextdoor: Local News, Garage Sales & Home Services
description:
Nextdoor is available nationwide.

Nextdoor is the neighborhood hub. Connect with your neighbors, stay in the know of what's happening, find home services near you, form a neighborhood watch, or just get to know the people in your neighborhood.

Use Nextdoor to stay informed about what’s going on in your neighborhood. Find a garage sale, dog walker, last-minute babysitter, or handyman. Network with your neighbors to keep up with local news, plan a local event, or share safety tips.

Neighbors can help us in so many ways, we just need an easier way to connect with them.

Whether you want to hire a local babysitter, find yard sale deals, or sell your unwanted household items, Nextdoor makes it easy to talk with neighbors about what matters most to you. 

Download Nextdoor and see for yourself why it’s the #1 neighborhood app:

Social Networking for Neighbors
• Get recommendations for the best local handyman
• Sell items to your neighbors
• Get offers & free stuff when a neighbor offers up that used appliance she no longer needs
• Meet your neighbors and finally call that nice man down the street by his first name

Neighborhood Events
• Find local events like cookouts and community activities
• Find yard sales and garage sales near you

Home Services & Deals
• Hire a babysitter or a recommended nanny 
• Hire a pet sitter or dog walker for your furry friend
• Hire a handyman pro, house sitter, or catering company with local classifieds

Safety Tips & Crime Watch
• Organize a neighborhood watch—quickly get the word out about crime and safety
• Share neighborhood crime reports
• Share information during a natural disaster

Network and connect with your neighbors, buy and sell things, and join a community when you download Nextdoor.

OUR MISSION
We created Nextdoor because we believe that the neighborhood is one of the most important and useful communities in a person's life. We hope that neighbors everywhere will use the Nextdoor platform to build stronger and safer neighborhoods around the world.

PRIVACY
Fences are sometimes necessary. But online privacy is always necessary. Nextdoor is 100% private—a trusted environment where all neighbors are verified, making it safe to share online the kinds of things you'd be okay sharing with your neighbors in person. 

Here's how:
• Every neighbor has to verify their address
• All members go by their real names, just like in person

Don’t miss out on what’s happening in your neighborhood. Download the app today.

Connect with us:
https://www.facebook.com/nextdoor
https://twitter.com/nextdoor

Terms: nextdoor.com/member_agreement
Privacy: nextdoor.com/privacy_policy
California "Do Not Sell My Information" Notice:  www.nextdoor.com/do_not_sell

recentChanges: Time for your weekly update! We're always working hard to make the Nextdoor app even better, so your experience is fun, fast, and bug-free.
comments: Before you download this app be aware that the extent to which they will pass along, and the liberties they will take with your private info borders on incredible. READ THE T&A, PRIVACY POLICY. If that's not enough, the app size listed in the "about" readme is about 18mb. The actual size of the install is almost 100mb. Just so you know. I'm certain there are plenty of alternatives out there and - I'm outta here!

I use this app for sharing/seeking recommendations and commenting on local issues. Also for advertising community events. The ambience of discussion is friendly and helpful. Occasional techy exchange of views, but the only aggressive 'troll' I have read seemed to get cut out fairly quickly. There is some monitoring , both automated (warning if you use a sweary word) and I think real time person monitoring. So it is a useful social media platform. Advertising keeps it going - not too intrusive.

A great idea and easy to use but it's only as good as the people who use it. I hope that it will not become another medium for people to promote their business and selling stuff. There are apps for that and Facebook has plenty. I appeal to people to avoid this and use it for the things that connect us rather than as a monetizing tool!

I find it helpful for getting people to do work around my house using other folks recommendations and I give mine too. The notifications about crime are also great and folks are aware of what's going on in their neighborhood. I appreciate the sheriff's dept alerts, too. Great all around app.

I haven't had this app long, but it does provide helpful local information. It is rather confusing but that should get better with use. Especially now, people are posting good information related to coronavirus resources, help for those needing assistance, and even a central Mid-Hudson Valley group who's mission it is to connect people needing help with those who can offer it.

Hoobly, Oodle, Classified Ads ,Laconto, Recycler, Kijiji, Offerup, Legtgo, CL and Gumbtree and more

Classified Listings Mobile - for Classified ads is an extremely easy-to-use app that allows users to search from millions of classified ads posted every day, and to post ads directly from the app. Optimized for the mobile devices, Classified Listings Mobile - for Classified ads provides functionalities of the browser version of the Classifieds on mobile devices with easy and usability.

Browse through sections devoted to jobs, housing, for sale, items wanted, services, community, gigs, resumes, & discussion forums with more than 80 million new classified advertisements posted each month. comments: Needs work. I'm giving the eBay app three stars because basically it does what it should, although it does need quite a bit more tweaking to function better. Unfortunately the issues that I have experienced relate to the everyday functionality of it. It is very glitchy and does need seemingly constant babysitting to ensure that it is doing everything you want it to and that it is not just deciding to do certain things for you. Use with caution.

I downloaded to buy a few things that I saw. I am ultimately unimpressed. Whereas I was excited to buy things from people (who accept my card type) and such, but 90% checking out I would get an alert saying "could not process payment, change card or try pay pal". Sometimes it would process the payment, but only one or two items instead of all 10. I just don't understand, the buyers accept my card type, I have the money, I just don't have the patience for all of this. Please fix this

I just installed the last update and it did nothing to correct the small text! I can barely read my messages and the entire app text is very small!!! Still sucks!!! I also don't like the new tracking screen! I used to be able to click on the tracing number and it would take me to the carriers website and with a simple click I could receive shipping updates on my orders! You people screwed that up too! Please put that back the way it was! REMEMBER FOLKS: "IF IT ISN'T BROKE, DON'T FIX IT!!!"

The messaging system is glitchy! I can't communicate with sellers as the send arrow only appears about 1/4 the time. It also has trouble loading the messages received so I can read them. Sometimes I have to click back out of the message and then back into it a few times before it decides to load.

Not any better than the previous one, jumping all over the place when doing searches, you request to search by lowest price first and it still hides them between the higher priced items, so taking ages and time consuming to find things I want at affordable prices. I also hate the assumption in every search that there are things I do not want to see in each subject, I want to see all items available not have only the ones chosen by someone else who knows nothing about what I may be looking for?

title: Target
description:
Now the Target app can help you have a more rewarding Target run! Introducing Target Circle, which gives you access to hundreds of deals, a birthday gift and the chance to support your community.

Plan your next Target run by checking out Target Circle offers, the Weekly Ad and item availability all in one place. Then streamline your run with store maps and aisle locations, and scan item barcodes for prices, reviews and available deals.

Wallet is the fastest, easiest way to pay and save in store. With one scan, you can pay with your credit or debit RedCard and redeem Target Circle offers, gift cards and Target Circle earnings.

summary: Plan, shop and save with the Target App, now with Target Circle.
recentChanges: We're constantly fixing bugs and making changes to improve your experience. Turn on your updates to stay on top of our latest and greatest.
comments: Pictures of items do not expand past the initial tap. Sometimes I have to take a screen shot and expand picture in my gallery. Other times I just go to another website. There are a lot of retailers out there carrying the same items. Target's prices aren't that great anyway. Although I periodically buy things from Target online, I mostly avoid it.

Right now, the "offers available" prompt is very confusing to follow. I searched for a good 30 minutes for the, supposed, "discount offer" as a circle member before finally giving up and just placing my order. Target devs, you have a long way to go. Especially considering the fact that you're simply taking advantage of the fear and panic everyone is experiencing at this time in our lives. Please step your game up. We all need you. Be that beacon of hope you promised you'd be.

I love this app! I can shop and add my savings at the end. I have different delivery options that are on the app. This is a great featurewith the store becauseI have a smallchild and I dont always want to get her out of the car if she is asleep. There are also times when I dont want to have to get dressed to go into the store for one item. It is amazing!

I find it frustrating when the app freezes up and has to be closed and reopened frequently. I was unsure about the notations in red indicating a possible delay in that particular item being available.which is certainly understandable under the current conditions. Did that also mean that the current gift card offer might no longer be available as well?

Have been using this for about 2 months now. It does just about everything that I need. Thanks! Update - love this app except for one thing - the search engine needs to be better. Even if you search for one specific item, it will bring back way too many different items. Update 3/11/20- love it, but PLEASE tune the search engine. Brings back way too many non-specific results.

description:
Join the millions of shoppers who use The Coupons App to shop and save easily at your favorite grocery and apparel stores as well as dining coupon discounts at restaurants nationwide. 15,000+ promo codes, millions of Amazon product discounts, 100,000+ local coupons nearest you! Fuel up and save by viewing local gas prices at a glance. Save $1000s with free in-store, online, Amazon & grocery coupons and deals at your favorite stores like Walmart, Target and Kroger. You’ll have access to thousands of coupons for the stores and restaurants you love, making saving money each week effortless. Best of all, you can manage all your grocery shopping lists and coupons right from your phone, in one single coupon app, without ever relying on a printer or installing multiple store apps.

summary: Shop and save with our smart, easy-to-use DG app.
recentChanges: At DG, we are always working to help you save more and are excited to launch Switch to Save as part of your Shopping List in the DG App. This new feature will let you know if there is a lower-priced DG product available as you’re adding items to your Shopping List. We’ve also made some other improvements and fixed a few bugs.
comments: I have used this app in the past, and I had no problem, but now when I need to log in again, it will not let me log in. After I re-installed it, I was able to get through that. Then it needed to send me a code to verify my device, and it keeps saying that the code has expired! I put it in immediately. How long is it valid for? 2 seconds? Very frustrating!

This app has been awful won't let me create an account and then when tried it won't let me finish it. Then when I try to use this app as a guest, and I try to take the scanner and price check it never works and I've been dealing with this for 2 weeks now this app is so frustrating.

Can't scan products. I have downloaded the app three times on two different phones and still the scan function for barcodes will not work. The purpose of me having the app is to check the prices on sale and clearance items before I purchase them, but I can't get it to work. In my opinion, the app has been horrible and a waste of time.

3/10/20. Well i didn't have to add a card to use. But i think it need to speed up as when after a scan it takes to long to load a price especially since you are forcing customers to use instore wifi, by blocking cell signal inside your stores. Auto location for the store you are in would make it better. Still has room for improvement.

The scan an item option is frustrating. It needs to be separated from the search window. It would be helpful to be able to save several stores to toggle between on the 'my store.' Many DG shoppers frequent multiple stores.

title: Krazy Coupon Lady: Coupons, Deals & Savings
description:
This coupon app is a must-have for finding the best in-store and online deals for places like Target, Walmart, Kohl’s, and more. Let us find you the best deals, offers and discounts at your favorite places to shop. Whether you’re just learning how to coupon or you’re an avid extreme couponer, this is an essential money-saving app. 

We’ll teach you how to find major savings on everything you buy... Set up deal alert notifications and you’ll know when to jump on a deal on 50+ top brands! We’re also tracking top retail categories, finding you coupons & deals at:

- Amazon
- Macy’s
- Costco
- Walgreens
- Best Buy
- Target
- Walmart
- Victoria’s Secret
- Kohl’s
- CVS
- Kroger
- Rite Aid
- Publix
- Safeway
- Family Dollar
- Dollar Tree
- And DOZENS more!

See ALL the available free coupons and rebate offers. This includes grocery deals, promo codes, Sunday coupons, online coupons, manufacturer coupons, ebates and more — we then send you deal alerts directly to your phone when the best sales happen. From printable coupons to e rebates we will show you how to get the best deal possible. Whether you want to clip the Sunday paper or digital coupons, our Krazy team does all the work for you!

Maybe you want to learn how to use the Walmart grocery, Ibotta, Target app or other apps for groceries? We will show you how step-by-step. In addition, we will coach on finding the best deals with other money saving apps, such as, Paribus, Retail Me Not, Groupon & more.

You want to save money and shop smart, but you need a deal finder. Yep. We get it. 

Other freaking brilliant things about this app:

- 100’s of deals posted every day with easy-to-follow instructions
- Change which brands you track and never miss a deal in the notifications center
- A constant stream of money-saving tips, tricks and life hacks
- The ability to select your favorite retailers and filter deals by store favorites
- Tutorials and videos to help turn new couponers into money-saving machines
- “Brags” section where you can share your money-saving successes with our community

Hey, friends don’t let friends overspend. Shop, save and share. Let’s get Krazy! Download the Krazy Coupon Lady app today.

We've been pulling together the most requested features and fixes from our community so you can get to saving more money!

comments: Awesome deals...if you can get to them before their gone that is. Helped me with my 1st year baby stuff a ton!! Dont know much about couponing but they make it dummy proof with step my step instructions on every deal and links for everything you need. Love seeing what pops up everyday!! If your not like me and dont like to be bothered as much the notifications are super customizable for your preferences and are always asking to make sure they're set how you like. 5 out of 5 well done ladies

I must say, this app has cleaned up very nicely. This app saves you money on products that people actually use. Unlike other apps that show you circulars to multiple stores. This app cut straight to the Chase and shows you where all the best deals are. I have multiple apps that display coupons but this one is by far the best, I've seen deals that were in other apps that this app displays plus more. In fact this app is so good I have deleted the other apps within this category. Great job

Love the deals posted on this app, the coupon break down & steps are very easy to follow!! Its a must download app to have on your phone especially if you like to save money on your favorite ptoducts and check out the nonadvertisted hidden savings in all your local favorite stores n get in on the hott savings online!! You will be glad that you did!! Also check out the free items!

I check this app several times a day. Not that need to because they send me all of the notifications that I need. I would also like to commend them on how useful and informative they have been regarding Covid-19. Keep up the Awesome job KCL! You are greatly appreciated!!

I Love it! It Keeps you in the Know, Up to Date, has a Variety of everything. Another Fav of mine unlike other Apps, is when deal Expires, it Lets you know so you Dont Waste Your Time. Only Down Fall, is That I DONT HAVE ENOUGH TIME TO GO AN GET EVERY DEAL!!

title: Yard Sale Treasure Map
description:
Chart your course to yard sale treasure!  Finding yard sales near you has never been more fun and easy!

Yard Sale Treasure Map is an app for accessing craigslist garage sales on mobile devices.  View your local yard sales in map or list format, view sale details and photos, get directions, and take advantage of advanced organizational and route planning features.

- Search by day, location, distance, and keyword
- Organize by color or by creating a sale route
- See Street View of the sale site before you visit
- Save time and gas by optimizing your sale route order
- Sync your sale route across all of your mobile devices
- Share your sale route with your friends
- Get directions to each sale as you shop

Want your sale to appear on this app?  Create a garage sale listing on craigslist.  We'll find you!  Don't wait until the last minute... post your sale as early as possible.

Are you having problems with this app?  Send an email to yardsaletreasuremap@gmail.com or start a dialog on Facebook.

The craigslist and associated trademark are owned by craigslist, Inc. and are being used under licensed permission from craigslist, Inc. for a limited purpose. www.craiglist.org

I use this app every weekend! I love the new option of navigating to either the pin location or the address, and the extra pin colors. It still needs a "never again" feature, for the repeater sales that are crappy.
Love this app. We can see quickly where sales are, what's being sold and what the hours are.🥰

Thief after 3 years is making me pay for the app every year. I paid when it was a one time fee. Now I feel ripped off to have to pay again. If I new you could change to yearly I never would have gotten. Now app is junk. Greedy!

title: Slickdeals: Shopping Deals, Coupons, & Promo Codes
description:
Slickdeals is the largest deal-sharing community on the Web with millions of people regularly using the Slickdeals app to discover, share, rate and shop the best deals and coupons for their favorite stores. We know when Kohl's has 30% off, if Walmart is price matching Amazon, and when Groupon has your favorite restaurant deal. If there’s a deal, coupon, rebate, promo, or freebie out there, we have it on the Frontpage.

There are people in this world who pay full price and there are people who don’t. After you download this app, you'll never pay full price again.

How it works:

Our community members find deals around the Web and share it on our forums. Every deal gets vetted by the community through votes and comments, and the good ones move up to the Popular Deals forum. If you want to beat the rush and increase your odds of snagging a great deal before it reaches the masses, the Popular Deals forum is the place to be.

The best Popular Deals are screened by our Deal Editors after getting enough votes to be considered for the Frontpage. If the deal is as good as it seems, it will graduate to the Frontpage, which features the best of the best savings and discounts on any given day.

If you prefer a more hands-off approach to finding great deals, set a Deal Alert and get notified whenever a deal matching what you're looking for is posted on Slickdeals. You can configure your alert to target keywords, stores and categories. You decide how and when you want to get notified, but remember, the best deals usually don't last long.

If you've already filled up your online shopping cart and are ready to buy, and want to see if there's a last chance to save some money, check out our coupons pages. We have coupons for every retail store that offers them and our in-house team of coupon editors are quick to remove expired promo codes so you don't waste your time.

If you like browsing deals by category, this is the app for you. If you wish to look at only video game deals or see a list of what household items that are on sale, for example, check out our category pages!

Have an issue with the app? Suggestions? Praises? Coupons? Send us an email android@slickdeals.net - Your feedback will help us make this the best deals app.

Slickdeals may share data or third parties may collect data for interest-based advertising. For more info, see the “Interest-Based Advertising” section of our privacy policy.

title: Offer Flights - Air Ticket Booking App

Additionally, we list some more airlines those are with us doing a great job, Emirates, Qatar Airways, Emirates, American Airlines, Singapore Airlines, Cathay Pacific, All Nippon, Etihad, Turkish, EVA Air, Qantas, Lufthansa, Garuda Indonesia, Hainan, Thai Airways, Air France, Swiss International, Asiana, Air New Zealand, Virgin Australia, Austrian Airlines, American Airlines, Air India, Jet Airways, Spicejet, Vistara, Southwest, United Airlines and budget airlines such as AirAsia, Norwegian, JetBlue, EasyJet, Jetstar, Asul, Vueling, easyJet, Cebu Pacific, Indigo etc.

descriptionHTML:
Offer Flights app helps you to find the best airfare by comparing worldwide online travel agencies and airline website. The companies that we comparing are like kayak, google flights, tripsta, kiwi flights, myholidays, mytrip, cleartrip, sastiticket, expedia, airfarewatchdog, bookingbuddy, scotts cheap flights, cheaptickets, priceline, jetradar, aviasales, tutu, Aviata, Yandex Flights, Anywayanyday, wotif, goibibo, smartfares, flightnetwork, momondo, and many more are there with us. We constantly adding more partners with us to get the best airline fare for our customers. Our app is best for booking domestic,international, budget and last minute flights with the lowest price using existing offers and discounts. We are in cooperated with many budget airlines such as Ryanair, AirAsia, Flydubai, Norweign Air, Westjet, Jetstar, Indigo, Southwest, Eurowings, Scott, Peach, Vueling, Nok air, Jetblue, Spirit Airlines, Frontier, Virgin America and more.

How we differ from others:
- The companies that we tied are our backbone on this travel industry. That's why we can deliver you the best price when compared with other travel services online.
- When you counting our partners, it's around 300+ Online travel agencies and 1000+ airlines globally. And still expanding.
- Our app supports multiple languages and currencies worldwide. So it's easy to use
- Have you heard about multi-city booking? multi-city flight booking is totally different from others and it's awesome.
- Our support system will help you with any cause, anytime. And that's our main job.
- There is no additional booking cost when you book through us. Actually, we don't like hidden fees.
- So our services are completely free to anyone, anywhere.

Additionally, we list some more airlines those are with us doing a great job, Emirates, Qatar Airways, Emirates, American Airlines, Singapore Airlines, Cathay Pacific, All Nippon, Etihad, Turkish, EVA Air, Qantas, Lufthansa, Garuda Indonesia, Hainan, Thai Airways, Air France, Swiss International, Asiana, Air New Zealand, Virgin Australia, Austrian Airlines, American Airlines, Air India, Jet Airways, Spicejet, Vistara, Southwest, United Airlines and budget airlines such as AirAsia, Norwegian, JetBlue, EasyJet, Jetstar, Asul, Vueling, easyJet, Cebu Pacific, Indigo etc.

Happy Journey.
summary:
Flights Tickets at discounted price.
Cheapest airfare online.
comments: It's probably the best app for booking flights at low cost and fast too. The performance of this app is smooth and definitely better than other flight booking apps. I recommend this app to LL the people out there in need of quick and fast booking without any hassle.

Easy to use. It provides the widest and cheapest options. Definitely my go-to app for finding flights. I will pair this with Trivago to find hotels. Most times, using separate sites give cheaper options than the ones provided by sites such aw Expedia.
Amazing app . Very helpful in finding flight tickets and hotels for stay at a low price.

I started using this app recently, found some very good deals in hotel & flights.Really appreciate the efforts they make to give the best possible deal in hotels & flights. Very satisfied with hotel & flights bookings, really looking forward to use this app for other services also.

Really great app, it shows Actuall price however rest app shows higher amount first and after giving promo code they come to the actual price, I would always prefer this app instead of others as they are making us fool and wasting your time.

title: ADM Offer Management
description:
ADM Offer Management mobile application is an easy & simple solution for producers to receive the price for the grain they work hard to grow. With the functionality of the DTN Portal now available in a mobile application, you will be able to make, manage, & monitor your offers to sell directly to ADM. 

Key Features:
- View updating cash bids anytime
- Create Cash Sale Offers 24/7
- Monitor updating  prices when futures markets are trading
- Update your target price any time 
- View Contracts traded on DTN Portal

This mobile application is powered by DTN and will sync with your online ADM Portal account. Call DTN at 1-800-311-1516 with any questions.

This app requires internet connection.

ADM Offer Management mobile application is an easy & simple solution for producers to receive the price for the grain they work hard to grow. title: DealDash: Bid, Save, Win & Shop Deals and Auctions
description:
Top 5 reasons to download the app & save money with Deal Dash

1) Save up to 99% on your favorite brands & products
2) Win Electronics, Gift Cards, Home Items, Jewelry, Beauty, Apparel, Holiday Vacation Stays, Tools and more
3) Always free shipping, no reserve prices
4) Only brand new items with original manufacturer’s warranty
5) Everything sells from DealDash or trusted partner stock - untrusted third party sellers are NOT allowed to sell on DealDash

Bid & save on online auctions for warehouse deals, closeout auctions, manufacturer stock, overstock surplus, wholesale offers and more.

Upcoming featured Auctions:

Apple iPhone X 256 GB Model
KitchenAid Mixers
Apple Macbooks
PlayStation 4 (PS4) Bundles
Gift Cards to Walmart, Target and more
… plus tens of thousands of other auctions every month!

DealDash has been in business for soon 10 years, selling top name brands at deeply discounted prices.

We serve more than 15,000,000 registered shoppers and hold an A+ Rating at the Better Business Bureau.

How Does DealDash Work?

1. Browse Auctions - All items sold on DealDash are brand new and come with manufacturer warranties. DealDash works directly with leading retailers and brands and sells items from their own or their trusted partners' warehouse stock.

2. Buy Bids - Bids allow you to participate in the auctions that enable you to save money on best-selling brand name items. You’re can purchase bids in a variety of different pack sizes. Bids can be usually purchased for less than $0.20 each.

3. Start Bidding - All auctions start at $0.00. Each bid placed adds one penny to the final price of the item. Each bid restarts the timer to 10 seconds to allow a chance for someone else to place a bid. All items are guaranteed to sell! There are never reserve prices and the items can go for as low as 99% off.

4. Win & Save Up to 99% - When no more bids are placed, the last bidder wins the auction. The winner gets the item for the discounted price and shipping is always FREE. Just like in a regular auction with no reserves, the excitement comes from the fact that any bid can be the last one!

5. What Happens If You Don’t Win? - Don’t worry! When you don’t win you can get all your bids back if you buy the item at its ‘Buy It Now & Get Your Bids Back’ price listed in the auction.

DealDash has been featured in the Financial Times, CNBC, Huffington Post and holds the highest A+ Rating at the Better Business Bureau.

Need any help with our Auctions? We’re happy to help 7 days a week! 

Get in touch with our customer service team by writing to community@dealdash.com.

recentChanges: Internal fixes and performance improvements. Happy bidding!
comments: This site is a complete waste of time and money. Designed to profit off all your bids you pay for. Don't download you'll regret it. I've never felt so robbed before by an app like dealdash every auction I played in i watched new ppl jump in after the 5 dollar cut off was in effect. This is done to run up your bids and waste your money.
I would not use. You need to pay for bids. The cheapest bundle is almost $70

I've spent hundreds on this app, I've won a few good items but mostly I trade them in for more bids to bid on a better item which ends up being a waste cause it's to hard to compete with the ones that's been on this site for 10 years and have fifty thousand bids built up and always bid on the good items...

Horrible and fake app uses bots to outbid you everytime and as soon as you stop bidding the bots do too and items say they get sold it's all fake wasted over $200 and didnt win anything good ever only the same bots keep winning
You all can cheated me out of the bid deal to hing four times i never got to bid one time has screwed me out of almost 400$ it needs to be getting fixed now....

title: Family Dollar
description:
Our App makes it even easier to save at Family Dollar, with quick access to deals and Smart Coupons, sneak peeks at new offers, and our new SmartSpins game. 

Download the Family Dollar App for the easiest way to save:
 
• Enjoy instant access to Smart Coupons
• Play SmartSpins, our new game, to win Smart Coupons. Every spin wins!
• Browse the weekly ad anytime, anywhere
• Scan products to find offers
• Easily find the nearest Family Dollar
 
Best of all, you’ll earn a spin to play SmartSpins every time you shop when you scan the app barcode or enter your phone number at checkout. Every spin wins a Smart Coupon! To redeem Smart Coupons, simply scan the app barcode or enter your phone number at checkout. Easy to use, easy to save, easy to win!

For feedback or technical issues please visit: 
https://www.familydollar.com/corporate/our-company/contactus

The Family Dollar app is the easiest way to get great savings and coupons for top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts, toys, and more. Get sneak peeks at our circular to find our best sales, bargains, and deals on top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts and toys when you’re planning a shopping trip to your neighborhood Family Dollar store. With our digital coupon app, you have instant access to savings, and no need to go online to look for offers. Plus, you can play our app game, SmartSpins, to win Smart Coupons. Clip Smart Coupons right in the app for the greatest deals. You can also scan products to check for Smart Coupons discounts, then clip the coupons to save, and redeem at checkout next time you go shopping. That way, you won’t miss any of our great offers on top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts, toys, and more. We know that our shoppers need good deals and easy ways to find bargains that stretch every dollar. With the Family Dollar digital coupon app, we offer convenient access to easy-to-use Smart Coupons, with savings that fit your budget. You can find and clip Smart Coupons for all your favorite brands. And you’ll win savings with SmartSpins, our app game. Whether you’re shopping for top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts or toys, Family Dollar is your store for great sales, bargains and savings on everything you need, with low prices that fit in your budget. Smart shoppers know they can find great bargains, savings and sales at Family Dollar. We understand that you have a tight budget, that you are shopping for deals and bargains, so we offer the savings and discounts you appreciate. Now, with our digital coupon app, it’s even easier for you to save, with instant access to coupons and discounts, plus our new app game where you can win savings every time you play. No need for paper coupons anymore: with the app, you clip digital Smart Coupons and redeem right at the register using just your app barcode or phone number. You’ll get deals and coupons tailored the way you shop. And we make it easy to clip, easy to use, easy to save on your favorite top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts, and toys.

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: You know what would be great? If the app stopped logging me out every 3 days. You know what else would be fantastic? If I could get rid of coupons that I KNOW FOR A FACT that I don't need. You make it easy to clip stuff that I don't even want. Now make it easy to delete it. And why does this app even NEED a password??? Because someone may steal my coupons??? Oh nooooo. Now you're just acting like over glorified CVS or Rite Aid or somewhere that actually has full shelves.

App worked great until my phone broke.. I had to reinstall on another phone.. Don't EVER forget your password. It's impossible to do a password reset I have a bunch of saved coupons and spins.. Family Dollar won't let me reset my password. The link in the password reset email just goes to the main page. The "contact us" link on the password reset email is a broken link as well. I tried calling the 800 number but apparently the line is only open "bankers hours". Closed before I leave for work . Already closed when I come home from work. Not open on weekends either. When I do take time off to call, I can't get a hold of a real person.. Just a voicemail system with a mountain of options, but no option of "app help". I left messages but no response. I spend a lot of money at Family Dollar since they are the only store within 15 miles from me. If I can't get coupons, I'll just buy my stuff from Amazon..

What a POS. I just tried to sign up and it has so many bugs just trying to key in a password that I'm am deleting it already. No sooner did I try to log in, it told me to change my password. When I sent for the code, it auto filled the code then sent me to the page to key in the new password....only there was no space to create one. I tried 3 times and it just sits there waiting for me to key something in with no space to do so. I'm beyond frustrated.

The app is horrible and almost as crappy as the products they carry. Don't bother downloading this app. Nobody at the stores know anything about it or why it doesn't work. You will spend your time clipping coupons only to find out at the cash register that you didn't fulfill the requirements that were buried 3 screens deep when you clipped it. A HUGE WASTE OF TIME.
Its ok, but only if ur looking for specific items. Wouldnt let me use the 'list' function on the app, the scanner wasnt that great either!

title: Fonepay (Offer)
description:
Fonepay Offer App gives you complete information about all the Fonepay Offers at various outlets and events all around Nepal. It gives you instant information about discount offers running, categorized according to customers need.


■ Features of the application
------------------------------------------------------

★ We grab 100% active offers. We always try to find up to date discount offers at following segments:
Airlines, Beauty and Fashion, Clothing and Accessories, Education ,Electronics, Entertainment, Events, Food and Dinning, Furniture and Handicraft, Health Care, Hotel and Resorts, Mart, pets, Stationery and Printing, Travel & Tours, Workshop/ auto care
★ Notifications - We'll notify you with hot deals and offers 
★ Search - We made search easy for you at your fingertips. Just give the name of store or product and we will retrieve the results for you. Not only this, you can filter offers according to the location , discount amount and category of your interest.
★ Location tracking – We give you information about the offers running around you according to your location
★ User-friendly app interface with simple design that everyone can easily use.

comments: Lots of bugs to fix. No OPT on single login button tap. Freezes a lot. Laggy map view and more.
The otp code arrives, but after entering it, the app doesn't proceed to another screen. Hope you fix it asap.
It doesnot shows the current points until and unless it is reinstall.
Great app. This will surely help to digitise the petty transactions that we incur everyday and help Nepal achieve the its objective- Digital2020
Best app to explore the market with discount and location.i have hound very unique feature in this app

title: Wish - Shopping Made Fun
description:
Style doesn’t have to be expensive.
Wish is a mobile shopping app that lets you shop over 100 million high-quality items at 60-90% off!

HOW IS WISH SO AFFORDABLE?
Wish connects shoppers directly to over 100 million manufacturers, so shoppers can find affordable goods. There’s no middle man, so prices are lower and the quality is the same as what you’d get at the mall.

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE
We take your security seriously and process your purchases securely.

JOIN 500+ MILLION USERS
Over 500+ million people use Wish to shop affordable goods. So skip the shopping mall and find lower prices on Wish.

REVIEWS, VIDEOS & PHOTOS
Read through customer reviews, view photos, and watch videos of their purchases to find the best deals. 

TRACKING
Track your purchases.

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you have questions about your order, reach our customer service easily through the app. Our customer service responds quickly.

30-DAY RETURN POLICY
Plus, if it’s not perfect, we have a 30-day return policy.

SAVE ON BRANDS
We now offer brands at affordable prices on Wish Outlet. Find discounted Apple, Samsonite, Burberry, Coach, Michael Kors, Ray Ban, Fossil, Guess, Tommy Hilfiger, Champion, Sperry and more!

5-7 DAY SHIPPING
Get faster shipping with Wish Express! Items with the Wish Express truck icon arrive at your door in 5-7 days.

SAVE BIGGER
Spin Blitz Buy to win more savings. When you spin Blitz Buy, you win access to extra discounts.

EARN REWARDS
Collect points with each purchase and redeem them for reward coupons.

60-90% OFF THESE CATEGORIES
Find discounts on trendy fashion, shoes, gadgets, kitchen tools, home goods, kids items, beauty, jewelry, watches, accessories, and more.

SKIP THE MALL, SHOP ON YOUR PHONE FOR....
Trendy womens fashion: dresses, jackets, bottoms, tops, sweaters, athleisure, swimwear, lingerie...

Quality mens fashion: jackets, sweaters, jeans, shirts, button-up tops, workout wear, underwear...

Accessories: hats, socks, scarves, belts, jewelry, watches, gym bags, travel bags, purses, backpacks...

Electronics: fitness trackers, cameras, drones, phone cases, battery packs, headphones, gadgets...

Beauty: brushes, skincare, perfume, lipstick, eyeshadow, foundation...

Shoes: sneakers, running shoes, boots, sandals, heels...

Home Goods: kitchen tools, cookware, knives, trendy home decor, lights, sheets, furniture...

Kids: clothes, toys, school supplies, baby gear...

Sports: exercise gear, weights, soccer, basketball, mens workout clothes, women’s athleisure...

Auto: organizers, cleaners, phone chargers...

WISH and the W logo are trademarks of ContextLogic Inc., registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and in other countries. All rights reserved.

summary: 🔥 Your endless supply of sales, promos & crazy-low prices. 💸
comments: I found and purchased several Items that I can use at fabulous prices. At first I thought that they only carried things I would never use, but I found they have things for everyone. Try hitting the find icon and you will be amazed. Their selection is vast. I found things I need right away and placed an order. Then I searched and found hundreds of things that I want, so after I pay my Bill's I can't wait to come back for more.

Good, just frustrating and time waster at times.You think that you bought an item and then they tell you that you did not get it. Delivery is expensive, but overall a good experience. It doesn't really let you search for what are you looking for, so that is why I give 3 starts, and because of delivery. Quicker to purchase on other sites. Good, because you can see lots of different items if you have the time.

Whenever I try to order my items, the transcation doesn't go through. It either says "oops, try again" or "please contact your credit card.." I am using a prepaid gift card and nothing is working. Not to mention you guys accept gift cards so what is there that is not going well? I typed in my information correctly and yet, it's still not accepting it. Plus, the prices on the items are off. For example, a shirt will say $7 but when you select your size, the price increases.

It's a good app where you can get things pretty cheap. I wish there was an option to get rid of the items you already have bought on there. It'll pop up on the newsfeed more than once and it gets pretty annoying at times. It would also be great if when you click on something cause you don't know what it is, for that reason alone and not wanting to buy it, that it wouldn't pop up on your newsfeed anymore. That gets annoying real quick cause most of the time I don't want that item.

I really dont know what to say about this app. It has been showing me "payment pending"since yesterday even though I have given my complete card details and everything!! It's really disappointing because it's my first purchase with Wish and they are already giving me a very poor service!It really glitches so many times!!!

title: Rakuten Ebates - Cash Back, Coupons & Promo Codes
description:
Ebates is now Rakuten! Enjoy the same Cash Back deals, savings, coupons, promo codes and amazing rewards on your online shopping, the same as you did before. Save money, earn rewards and shop at all your favorite stores. Come on in! ✨

Shopping with Rakuten for the first time? You’ll also get a $10 Welcome Bonus! Get ready to unlock amazing savings!

Fancy dining out? You can get Cash Back on 10,000+ restaurants too!

💰Cash Back shopping is easy – sign up for a FREE account today with Rakuten and start saving money!

Earn Rakuten rewards and save money everywhere you shop. Get the best deals, browse 2,500+ stores AND earn Cash Back when you shop at stores like Walmart, ride Lyft, or get food delivery with Grubhub, or Caviar.

💰Cash Back shopping: 5 reasons you’ll love the Rakuten rewards app 💵

recentChanges:
- Ebates is now Rakuten! We’ve changed our name, logo and app icon, but everything else stays exactly the same:
- Same Services: You can still shop at more than 2,500 stores and get Cash Back rewards.
- Same Account: Your Cash Back and your account details are unchanged and as secure as ever.

comments: I really like this app. You have to stay on top of your cash back though because sometimes it misses it. I always double check after i place an order though so it's not so bad. I am upset they removed Wal-Mart and Amazon from this app because those were the two i used the most. I hope they put them back!

Waste of time. It takes weeks for cash back to be added to your account...if you are credited at all. When you submit an inquiry to see where your cashback dollars are (which is a challenge of its own), you get error messages and can't complete the process. Rakuten, If 0% back on a $500 purchase from Amazon was the special offer, you nailed it. Don't waste your time or data.

Have been using this app for a while (when it was ebates). Love that you get cash back on purchases, however for EVERY Amazon purchase, you have to manually add your purchases.. It's ALWAYS been like this. The missing cash back is quickly added to my account when submitted,, but it's just annoying because I do almost half of my online shopping on Amazon.

Bad for In-Store shopping. This app is more online based, connecting your online shopping accounts and purchases in order to give you cash back. This app also only allows one bank account to be connected, which isn't very flexible for a family. Also, if you want to take pictures of your receipts and your family's receipts, this app is not for you. There is no "receipt picture taking" option since this app is more focused on providing coupons while you shop online; then gives u cash back online.

So far so good, there is a few months in between pay periods but at least you have a chance to build up your funds towards a refund check or PayPal. U receive a small% back from shopping, while using this app before you buy. And i love that you can choose from sooo many different stores to shop at. Thank you rakuten(Ebates) app.

recentChanges:
We want our app to work better & faster for you, so we're updating it as often as possible. Check back regularly for more fixes & features, including app-exclusive offers!

If you love what you see, rate us! Any Q's? Tap on Customer Service under our MORE tab.
comments: Since day 1 I have change my password in order to make payment, very frustrating to say the least. Then it locks me out for 30 min because of too many attempts. After the first and only attempt, again, very frustrating. I am to the point of cutting all ties with it all. POS

I havent used the app for a few weeks or so, and ive really liked the app even tho getting rid of my favs was kinda stupid. Theres been an update or two since aaaand the shop doesnt work now. Like its blank. No options to reload page or whatever. Idk if its a singular issue or if others are having this sort of problem.

I love the apps just don't understand why they would take away the Love List! Now if I find something I love but don't want to purchase with my current transaction I have to completely take it out of my cart and try to relocate the item again after I have made my purchase so that I don't lose track of it. How on Earth are you supposed to keep track of the items thought you loved if there is no place to store your favorites? I can deal with every glitch or app issue but that one so that would be my highest recommended problem to address with this app. With this being a billion dollar clothing\lingerie industry with both of their apps being out for years now I don't understand why they haven't been updated with a list for you to store your favorite items just like the website. I'm kinda shocked at that issue.. 🤔

Terrible experience! There always seems to be an issue. I contact customer service online and over the phone and they dont know how to solve the issue. Very inconvenient. I have the Angel credit card, which I make sure to pay on time every month. But, if I cannot use it then it's not worth having it.
It took forever to sign me in using finger print. And never did actually load. Yes mine app is up to date.

title: hotukdeals - Voucher Codes, Deals, Freebies, Sale
description:
The official hotukdeals app is your access to deals, voucher codes, freebies and savings right on your mobile device. Join our community of consumers who freely share offers, sales, discounts and tips that often aren't advertised in stores or flyers.
Never pay retail again! 😎💰

~~~~~~~~~~~
APP FEATURES:
~~~~~~~~~~~
⭐ View the hottest deals our community voted as ‘Hot!’.
⭐ Submit deals or tips from anywhere, as you find them.
⭐ Share the hottest deals via Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, email or text message.
⭐ Keyword alerts: Get notified as soon as a deal you're interested in gets posted*
⭐ Find up to date voucher codes from trusted retailers
⭐ hotukdeals keyword alerts allow you to enter a descriptive word like “Xbox", “TV”, “Laptop” or "Lego" and get a notification when new deals match your interests.

If you have a specific item in mind, this app also allows you to search offers by keyword. For example, gaming fiends can find the hottest PS4 or Xbox One deals, whilst others might be looking for a cheap tablet or smartphone.

~~~~~~~~~~~
Join our community:
~~~~~~~~~~~
Sign up for a free hotukdeals account to unlock additional app features. Members can give and get genuine advice on deals, merchants, products, services and more.

Joining the hotukdeals community lets you:
✔ Comment on shared hot deals, discount codes and questions
✔ Rate other members’ deals by voting hot or cold
✔ Follow the activity on your posts and keep up to date with your favourite users
✔ Plus, your Activity Feed helps you easily keep track of deal updates, comments, votes made by other members, and deals posted by your favourite merchants

Additionally the app helps you keep track of all the major shopping events like Black Friday, to make sure you will find the best Black Friday deals

Further events:
· January Sales
· Boxing Day
· Prime Day
· Cyber Monday

Hundreds of hidden deals are being posted everyday, so don't miss out and find the best deals of the day.

Install the app and get hooked on hotukdeals - guaranteed 100% free and without ads!

recentChanges:
• We moved the alerts to the bell notifications menu so you can have all your notifications in one single place
• You can now use an Apple login to create an account

comments: Really good app. Find all bargains around you. Really good genuine, up to date information at all times.
Great app for hunting or those bargains, with a good online community. Navigation could be a little less fiddly though

About 95% the offers on my screens/categories have expired - why would I be interested in historic offerings? They need to remove expired offers and keep the app current for it to be of any interest or value to impatient monkeys like me.

One of my most used apps, although in the most recent update they seem to have moved the search button from the top right next to the bell icon to under the 3 dot menu in the top right instead. This seems completely unnecessary to me, so I've removed a star. Response to the dev - My bad I had increased the display size on my phone so I've taken it back to 5 stars, does look like their is ample space for it to fit in though even at the larger display size!

Used to work brilliantly but lately I get a notification that I have a deal in my alerts list but when I go to the alert section its empty? Used to work great but not so much. I've reinstalled it and restarted my phone. Must be this version Review updated: this problem has been fixed so now back to 5 stars!

title: Taco Bell
description:
"You said it and we listened. The new and improved Taco Bell app is here!

App Features:
- Customize your favorite item
- Schedule a pick up time
- Favorite & share your go to items 
- Quickly reorder your go to meal with “Fast Favorite”
- Track your order 

Additional Features:
- Browse locations
- Opt in to notifications and receive status updates about your order in real time
- Add and use Taco Bell Gift Cards

Download and stay a while. Welcome to the new Taco Bell App!"
descriptionHTML:
"You said it and we listened. The new and improved Taco Bell app is here!

App Features:

Additional Features:
