Download and stay a while. Welcome to the new Taco Bell App!"
summary: Customize, order ahead, pay easily, & skip the line. This is how you Taco Bell.
recentChanges: Minor enhancements and bug fixes.
comments: Previously I would have given 5 stars, because I could save my favorites with all the custom toppings for easy reordering. Being able to just walk in and pick up was awesome. But in the last week or two, it has been completely unusable. It starts to open, and then just freezes at a black screen. It's not my phone, as other apps are working great. If they fix this, I will update my review.

3-21-20 The app opens to black screen and never goes any farther than that then the app crashes. Please fix this. Before the last update the app would open but it would take an incredibly long time to load anything when I tapped on it. Then it got to the point that it would just sit there and the loading icon would spin endlessly. After the update my app won't load at all, I just keep getting an error message over and over and over until I close the app.

Now the shortcut to the app is gone from my LG phone. I can use the app from the PlayStore but it says it is only for iphone or ipad. Pretty good so far. Only issue is mixed up drive-thru or at the register. They don't check both places, they just say they never got the order. Got charged twice and never got the refund. Issues, but the app is easy to use & looks good.

Had this app installed on my phone for months with little to no issue. Tried to open it today and I got a black screen and it wouldnt load. I uninstalled it then reinstalled. I was able to get it to load but now I'm having an issue where I can't customize my drink. I can't even select a drink. This is frustrating. App needs work.

I enjoy taco bell, but this app needs some love. After this most recent update that "fixes bugs" now there are others. Every time I try to swap my medium drink on the new combo literally nothing happens. It still says medium drink after selecting large. Additionally I'm wondering why the taco bell app doesn't have the ability to place your order and then just click on it when you arrive. First time I ordered on it I was expecting this, but my order was instantly placed and starting to be made.

title: Postings (Craigslist Search App)
description:
Postings (formerly CLapp) attempts to be the easiest to use and the most visually appealing Craigslist search application in the Marketplace and is written by a Craigslist addict for Craigslist addicts.

Note: We no longer are able to show listings from the Personals section of Craigslist since the content violates the Play Store's terms of service and we can no longer risk being pulled from the Store (we have been twice now as a result).
descriptionHTML:
Postings (formerly CLapp) attempts to be the easiest to use and the most visually appealing Craigslist search application in the Marketplace and is written by a Craigslist addict for Craigslist addicts.

Note: We no longer are able to show listings from the Personals section of Craigslist since the content violates the Play Store's terms of service and we can no longer risk being pulled from the Store (we have been twice now as a result).
summary: A clean and simple search app for Craigslist postings.
recentChanges:
Returned Year range query in the Car and Truck categories
Added posting support for Garage and Moving Sales
Fixed posting to Tickets categories and a few others
comments: I've used this app exclusively for the past few years and love it!! But recent updates broke a few things like search filters. Now something as simple as min and max price don't work. It's extremely frustrating and I've emailed the developer multiple times providing debug info, but never getting a response. I have to use other apps in the meantime, no filters make it useless.

Your app is really pretty useless my photos dont show up there is just a cloud where the photo should be I have to guess which image I want and if I get the wrong one I have to delete and start over because you can't edit photos once its posted. And you can't manage your account within the app you have to do everything through email which is a pain having to go back and forth.

I'll give it to you, it's a great app and easy to use. I've never had issues, and I've been using it for years. So why the 2 stars instead of 5? Started charging people to post vehicles, plain and simple. There used to be hundreds of vehicles if not thousands for sale by owners, now you're lucky if you get a handful sometimes. Why pay money to post something you're trying to sale? Does that help guarantee a sale? Does that stop car dealers from posting the same vehicle multiple times, no.

I post a vehicle for sell after a few hours I decided to look up the vehicle to see what customer are seeing. It was hard to find the vehicle even after adjusting the category it was still hard to find it. If you're trying to sell vehicle your best bet is to try another app

Every time they update it, new things break. Now, some of the filters have stopped working. I've emailed them at least twice. No response. It was great - once, but they seem to be masters of "if it ain't broken, fix it til it is."

title: Google Shopping: Discover, compare prices & buy
description:
The Google Shopping app enables you to shop millions of items across thousands of stores with confidence. Buy directly on Google with an easy and secure checkout, using your Google account.  When you buy on Google, your order is backed by a Google guarantee - with simple returns and customer support 7 days a week.

Easier shopping, all from one spot, no membership required
Whether you’re shopping for an everyday necessity, a gift, or something new and unique, you’ll find it easy to browse departments and products with the Google Shopping app. Google Shopping is free and doesn’t require a paid membership to enjoy all its benefits.

Thoughtful recommendations
Get deals and product recommendations just for you, inspired by your Google activity. 

Compare stores, prices, and more
The Google Shopping app brings thousands of stores together in one place, so you can shop your favorite places or try somewhere new. Quickly compare prices, reviews, brands, and store availability to find the best option for you - both online and nearby.

Exclusive deals and free shipping
Save time and money on the go, with app-exclusive deals and promo codes from stores. Get free shipping on qualifying orders, with most items arriving within 3-5 days. Save even more with daily deals and frequent flash sales.

Download the app now to start shopping millions of items across thousands more stores - all in one convenient place.

comments: The Google Shopping experience is pretty clean and intuitive, and the selection of products from various stores is nicely varied. I really appreciate that my purchases are "carbon neutral" thanks to Google's sustainability commitments and the checkout process is simple and smooth. My only complaint is that I don't have a simple way of submitting feedback on products that don't correctly show up in my search or on reviews that are incorrectly associated to a product.

This shopping application is very inclusive. The Google assistant explained that "Google play balance "was an acceptable payment method. But, the application does not include these playstore card amounts as a alternative. Please assist orvell Burrell with "registering "for this payment method. This method will be very convenient.
App is aesthetically nice. Selection and categories are great. Better integration with Google Keep and your Shopping List would be nice. The UX is a bit hard to get used to as well.
Great shopping experience. Best part is the accuracy of the search results. Found exactly what I was looking for in 3-words-or-less!!!
when i scan a bar code for an item search, it shows nothing unless i clink a link and then it takes me to the result page. its sloppy. please look into it...

title: KSL Classifieds
description:
The KSL Classifieds app is the most popular and trusted classifieds marketplace in the Intermountain West.

Looking for something to buy? Find like a bajillion listings in Classifieds, Cars, and Homes. Have something to sell? With millions of people using the app every month, items listed on KSL are gone before you know it.

Looking for your next career move? Our Jobs section has new job openings posted every day.

Need a plumber? We've got 'em. Electrical system going haywire? Get the scoop on local services, read reviews, and contact the best local pro for your next project!

FEATURES
•    Post items for sale in seconds – list faster, sell quicker
•    Buy locally – shop for new and used items near you
•    Find your next car – thousands of new and used cars posted every day
•    View for rent and for sale properties in our Homes section
•    Browse local job opportunities and submit your resume directly from the app
•    Contact a local service provider to help with your next project

Leave a review about the things you like or send us a note through the app or to support@ksl.com with any questions or concerns. Thanks for using KSL Classifieds!

recentChanges:
We've ditched the map interface and streamlined filtering your search by location. And if location isn't important to your search, location services will no longer default your results to those nearest you.

We also included a bug fix so you'll no longer need to reselect your category when modifying your search.

As always, keep the feedback coming! Leave a review about the things you like or send us a note at support@ksl.com with any questions. Thanks for using KSL Classifieds!
comments: App frequently deletes all of the pictures from the listing after editing.
It's OK some glitches but good resource to find stuff locally B-
It's like an app for retailers or businesses to hock their expensive stuff. I wanted to look at real people's couches for sale not Giant Couch Warehouse™

After latest update many of the photos won't load. I'll do a search for a car and the main photo most of the time shows up in the search, but when you click on the specific ad only a couple photos of the whole post will show up. Hopefully gets fixed soon. Using a Pixel 3.

Loved the app until the most recent updatee happened. Never had a problem until now. Cant hardly get it to open and when it does errors frequently pop up and the app crashes. Most of the time pictures never load. I tried using the regular website and it seems to have the same problems. Please fix!

title: G2A - Games, Gift Cards & More
description:
G2A.COM is the fastest growing digital gaming marketplace, where 19 million customers come to browse over 75 thousand games and other digital and physical products, offered by 450 thousand sellers.
Shopping for games just got easier! Get access to awesome titles at great prices, wherever you are and whenever you feel like it. Turn your phone into a portable browser for digital products today. We have everything, ranging from bestsellers and true classics to the latest releases.

Features:

•	Amazing product range
No matter how many games you have in your collection, it's never enough! We are the fastest growing digital gaming marketplace, created by gamers for gamers. With our mobile app you can easily search for over 75,000 products for platforms like Steam, Origin, GOG, Uplay, Battle.net, Xbox One, PSN and more!

•	Best deals
G2A.COM offers the lowest prices on the market – no need to search elsewhere!

•	Convenient shopping
Fast and user-friendly checkout designed to make your shopping experience even better.

•	Easy and secure payments
Our online payment gateway G2A PAY supports over 200 methods and 80 currencies – pay in a hassle-free way!

QA Questions? Suggestions? Drop us a message at and@g2a.com.

comments: App works perfectly. Other than some delayed popups for new deals (that therefore obscure my view of deals I'm already looking at). Only other complaint would be it signs me out all the time despite me consistently checking off "remember this device" and such in hopes of not needing to sign in again. Silver lining to that issue is I still have a favorites list even when not signed in, so it's only a problem when I wanna buy stuff or manage my account. I would still like that to be fixed, though.

App severely lacking. Can't buy through app?! My saved payment info does not display. When I want to pay it takes me to my browser to input my information from scratch. If I save a game or add it to cart, it does not display when I sign in to G2A on my laptop. Why even use the app? May as well use my laptop. This should work like the Steam app. But it doesn't. I want to use this app to buy and add things to wishlist. Can't do either easily. Also, can't contact sellers or support team? Why?
Not as many features as the mobile website, expectedly but still super smooth and easy to use yo.
Can be slow at times but if you pick high rated sellers it's a good place for discounts!
I check G2A before buying any kind of game because G2A provide lots of games with good amount of deals with some genuine sellers. And they only offer with international payment methods.

comments: This app is trash. This is a waste of time. I tried to get the play store card, had 101 entries, wasted so many times on pesky ads, and haven't had a single win. HOW TF CAN ANOTHER PERSON WIN THAT EASILY. You know what Idc anymore I have 4 play store cards. And I don't need pixel 4. I can buy a Nokia 2.3 next month. So, go ahead and waste your time on this sh*tty app.

This is a great app. I especially love the updates because it keeps the game fresh and exciting. And, I finally won!!! I haven't won again in months, so I'm really hoping to win another prize...please!!!!🤞 I have definitely shared this great app with all my friends and family and now they love it too!! Thanks for making such a fun and entertaining app!!🙂

I play this app less and less because I realized some people are winning multiple times . You get extra entries and they reward you extra entries if you download their other app Lucky Quiz. I've been playing for sometime. And I dont think it's right if the same people are winning multiple times. You're not guaranteed to win although I like believing I will. It helps me focus on bringing money and prizes into my life. Just know that you might not win and you might. Just focus on your life 1st!

Other than the overwhelming amount of ads (which admitting-ly was expected) it's exactly what it says it is. Worth trying out if not keeping around for a "productive" (selfish) form of entertainment when you're bored but also brain dead. ♡ (I honestly mean that in the kindest way possible ... 🙃)

I don't have a lot of complaints at all.This is a good app,but I think it should be.Easier to get your stuff without the hassle. Besides that I threw this app is very helpful and I like to play it on a daily basis. Thank you for creating this app and this experience will help a lot of of people.

title: Carousell: Snap-Sell, Chat-Buy
description:
Carousell is a community marketplace that lets you buy and sell everything from fashion, clothes, accessories, beauty products, furniture, art, books, branded goods, cars, bikes, and antiques to houses. Declutter your closet, room, or home of old stuff by putting them up for sale on Carousell - it's the best place to find a new home for your pre-loved items.

Running out of storage space for new purchases?
★ Create beautiful listings in 30 seconds to sell or shop from a massive online marketplace wherever, whenever.
★ No listing fees, commissions, or extra charges... Its totally free to buy and sell!
★ Customised search with keywords for fast and easy shopping
★ Chat with local and foreign sellers & buyers with a single tap
★ Let go of your preloved and make money, while discovering great deals
★ With Carousell Groups, you can buy and sell in interest groups, neighborhood groups, school groups and more! It’s more trusty and fun to buy and sell in a community that you and fellow members care about!
★ Set up your very own mobile and web e-commerce store quickly and seamlessly – its as easy as posting on Instagram

For Sellers…
★ Offer up your preloved items - free up garage / storage space and make money at the same time
★ Snap, List, Sell: free listings with up to 4 photos to sell your new and used / second-hand items + in-app editing features
★ When listing something for sale, you can post it to multiple Carousell Groups to reach more buyers!
★ Instantly share listings on Facebook Pages, Groups and Timeline, Twitter, and Instagram
★ Raise the bar on your street cred by accumulating positive member feedback from other Carousellers.
★ Earn a verified badge to boost your credibility by connecting via Facebook and verifying your email
★ Beautiful promotional images magically generated based on your Carousell profile that you can share across all your social networks and interact with friends through likes and comments.

For Buyers...
★ Effortless catalog-like browsing for unique items
★ Great variety of second-hand branded goods like designer bags, shoes, makeup and beauty products, to watches and automobiles.
★ Private Chat feature within the app to talk to sellers to buy an item and negotiate on prices, or ask for more images of the product before you make an offer
★ Safe transactions with trusted sellers: Get the lowdown on other users' experiences on any seller by checking out their member feedback
★ Get the best deal or bargain in your neighbourhood or country across over 18 categories
★ Sort items by Nearest, Recent, and Popular, and by Location
★ Personalize your marketplace by following your favourite community members to get updates on new listings

To get the full experience of the app, grant us the following permissions:
• WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : so we can save used photos on your external storage
• READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: so we can upload photos that are saved on your external storage
• ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION: so we know where you are located to show you nearby listings and tag your own listings to the right location
• ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION: we need your exact location to provide you with a hyperlocal experience
• CAMERA: used to access camera for snapping photos before you can list and sell them!

Carousell is currently supported in Singapore, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Philippines, Indonesia, Taiwan, Australia, New Zealand and Canada.

Also available from Carousell:
CarouBiz - Carousell for Business, a new subscription service
Terms of Use: https://carousell.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360023894734

recentChanges:
Good news! This release includes improvements and bug fixes to help you buy and sell better.

Update your Carousell app to experience the latest enhancements. If you are experiencing instability, bear with us while we work on continually improving our app!

Love being a part of our community? Rate us! Share your feedback with new users so we can grow our community further. Happy Carouselling!
comments: Ugh, today a glitch creates an offer of "$0" whenever I initiate a chat. More bugs in chats, notifications and even listings now. I get notifications way after I've already read them in the app. Also can't mark items as reserved normally. Reliability is down. For those reading that Carousell is a scam or that you need to pay to use/sell, it's not true. I've been selling and buying fine for a few years now without choosing to "promote" listings. It may take some time to find a buyer, it's normal.

It was ok at first. But now they want you to pay to promote the items that you are selling. Their search feature is aweful. You put a 10 km radius and they will show you things 200 km away. Then you have 90% falsely listed items in wrong categories. They say no fakes or counterfeit items allowed but their best sellers are the ones selling fake items. Then you have to deal with idiots who want you to lower the price by 50% or more even when you clearly list as final price.

I use to love this app because i use to get the best deal for some items. But the recent bugs in the app really annoys me as it made me lose out on a few deals which i was really interested in buying from the seller. The chat list won't load up. Server error encountered. That's the main bug that I face. Please fixed this bug and the other bugs that the other users are facing. Thank you.

I have been using carousel for many years. It has come to my attention that the search engine has changed recently and I hate it,compared to previously search engine. For eg, when I search TV soundbar mount, specific listings will pop up and I appreciate I can find what I need immediately. now, all kinds of TV mount listing which I don't even need pops up. It complete spoils the user experience of searching. "macbook air case" comes in all the macbook listing appears which are unnecessary.

Web app and Android app is very buggy. Chat conversations won't send, and often disappear randomly after an error (you have to reenter them from scratch again after the error!) Images being sent by you and to you are BLANK. Late arrival of chats. Item marked by system as SOLD but I am still in negotiations with the seller (offer accepted but no transaction yet.) Reviews disappear once submitted. App has all sorts of weird bugs, and these occur both in my old and new Samsung phones. Please fix!

description:
Souq.com app allows you to browse and buy from over 600,000 products at large discounts in all shopping categories like: Fashion, electronics, mobiles, tablets and original perfumes.

If you live in the United Arab Emirates (UAE), Saudi Arabia, Kuwait or Egypt and looking for the best daily deals and best discounts in any online shopping website or app then Souq.com is the answer. Souq.com application allows you to pay using various payment methods, pay cash on delivery or pay online using your credit card or PayPal. We also offer easy EMI options through Pay easy. comments: Very good layout , display , user interface. It's loads slow .

You say you've fixed the bugs but it keeps asking me to update although the app is up-to-date. I even deleted the app and redownloaded it and same thing keeps happening. Also I don't know why is it only on your great app that I have to try to add the item twice in order for it to be actually added in the basket. You guys really need to try and go on checking other shopping apps to see how they make shopping easy.
Best shopping website , all products are ģood and original as described , customer service is very friendly and help in any problem.
Good App. for shopping throw internet and easy to pay, trusted location. Thank you for your cooperative.

After the latest stupid update i didn't see the whole offers cause the app skips to the stupid Google play update without doing anything ,which cost me that i didn't recognize that the end of CIB 15% discount was 27/2 . So i made the purchase at 1/3 and didn't get any discount. When i called the c.s they say it's not our fault the it's the bank's

title: Copart – Salvage Car Auctions
description:
Access to Thousands of Vehicles

Browse over 125,000 cars, trucks, SUVs and more with the Copart App. Scan barcodes at a Copart location to quickly find details for any vehicle. Add vehicles to your Watchlist and place bids in Copart’s online auto auctions. Use the Vehicle Finder tool to quickly find vehicles or search our online inventory by type, year, make, model, location and more from any mobile device. The Copart App gives you access to thousands of salvage and clean title cars in vehicle auctions every day.

Bid and Buy from Anywhere

Log in using your existing Copart account or register through the app and quickly upload IDs and licenses directly to your account. Create and manage Watchlists and Saved Searches. Get notified about the results of your auctions and stay informed about vehicles on your Watchlist. The Copart App gives you full access to participate in our online auto auctions to bid and win your next vehicle!

Global App

Select your country to view vehicles on Copart.com, Copart.ca, Copart.co.uk, Copart.de, copart.com.br, Copartmea.com, Copart.es or Copart.ie all on one app. Find the vehicle auctions closest to you from anywhere in the world.

Features:

• Search, bid and buy with the tap of a finger
• Receive instant activity notifications
• Manage your Watchlist, Saved Searches and Pre-Bids on the go
• Find Recommended Vehicles based on your location, or on specific vehicles characteristics (Recommendations Engine available in the app for US & UK only)
• Use Voice Search by simply speaking your search criteria
• Get quick access to Today’s Auctions, Vehicle Finder, Locations and Last Searches from the enhanced dashboard
• Search for auctions by location and date
• Quickly search our global inventory for any type of vehicle by make, model, year, location and more
• View AutoCheck vehicle history reports (when available) and Copart Condition Reports
• Receive notifications about counterbid offers, lots won, lots lost and Watchlist vehicles up for auction
• View Payments Due and Payment History
• Pay through the app via personal credit or debit card (domestic accounts only)
• Access the QR code for the gate pass – with the Copart Mobile App, printing the gate pass is no longer necessary
• Learn more about the app with the Welcome Tour

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: Horrible, horrible experience with this app. This app has now make me lose on so many cars that I wanted to buy. It just shuts down for no good reason. Keep saying it has send the error message and you expect that something will be done about it but its been months that it is happening and nothing is done about it. The developer need to be taken to task and be asked for a refund. The app is clearly not designed to deal with a lot of traffic, hence in busy times the app will pack up and shut down

Some parts of the app aren't very user friendly. Here in the PDX area, we have 3 lots in the general area. I can't choose to filter for only those 3 lots, and combine with certain kinds of vehicles. I have to choose the North PDX lot, Or, the South PDX lot. There are other areas of the app that needs work also.

Great app, does as you expect. Loads faster than the website but also has the same problem as the website where if you join an auction, you cant bid on the vehicle that you join on if bidding has already commenced.
The site is awesome, the one thing everyone told me before I downloaded it is that it is extremely slow and boy it is slow very frustrating when you're trying to get through the list
Pretty good so far. Haven't had any issues yet. It's different than the website but it's very user friendly. I like layout of the app. 5* from me.

title: McDonald's
description:
Just tap “install” to receive exclusive McDonald’s deals, coupons, offers and more! It’s as simple as that! Bring the App to a nearby participating McDonald’s and redeem your next meal deal.

Check out the Awesome McDonald’s App Features:
Mobile order your favorite McDonald’s meal, pay through the App, and then come pick it up or get it delivered to your door!
• Choose how to pick up your meal- Curbside, Counter and Drive Thru Pickup!
• View the full McDonald’s Menu to find your favorite food and drink items! 
• Order McDelivery and get your food delivered to your door
• Enjoy exclusive App offers and food deals when you download
• Find your closest McDonald’s store hours, location, amenities and more
• Customize your order and save your favorite foods to the App to reorder with ease 
• Earn McCafé rewards and redeem exclusive McCafé offers on your phone

Data rates may apply. Prices and participation may vary. Offers available only at participating restaurants. Check https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/terms-and-conditions.html for Terms and Conditions and more information. ©2020 McDonald’s

• Enjoy exclusive App offers and food deals when you download
• Find your closest McDonald’s store hours, location, amenities and more
• Customize your order and save your favorite foods to the App to reorder with ease
• Earn McCafé rewards and redeem exclusive McCafé offers on your phone

Data rates may apply. Prices and participation may vary. Offers available only at participating restaurants. Check https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/terms-and-conditions.html for Terms and Conditions and more information. ©2020 McDonald’s
summary: Get free McDonald's offers delivered right to your mobile phone!
recentChanges: Various other fixes and performance enhancements.
comments: This app has been hit or miss over the last few years. For the last 2-3 weeks it is totally forze. It opens, displays the golden arches for 3-4 seconds, goes to the main screen, and then totally craps out. Touch screen is not responsive. No matter what or where I touch. Worked fine a few weeks back. Phone is a newer Samsung Galaxy, so it is not the phone. Burger King, Wendy's and all the rest work fine. I PREFER McDonalds to the others, but will eat any of the,. Luckily, there is a Burger King right across the street from McDonalds, so they have been getting my business lately. Fix your app McDonalds! Until then, Burger King is stealing your business.

When it works, it's great. Lately it just opens and freezes. Also, the issue with the GPS location. I'm pregnant and I made the order and sent my husband to fetch it on his way home only to find my order had disappeared and the order number is not valid without the GPS location being at the McDonald's. That makes no sense. He downloaded the app and signed in to my account and the order was just gone. I can only seem to use the app if I go to one location across town and I have to be present.

This app throws me out on a regular basis and I have to sign in again (as the woman is asking me for my money). In addition many of the discounts and offers want you to make your purchase on the app. I STILL write checks and mail them to pay my Bills. I have no desire to use a mobile app to place my order. ( I was unable to participate in the gold cup sweepstakes either).

The deals, interface, and ease of use is great. The issue is the app remembering who you are. It constantly kicks me out and I have to sign back in and I no longer can pay through the app which makes some of the deals useless. It removed my form of payment and whenever I attempt to re-enter it, the text box stays blank. I've tried multiple cards, uninstalling and reinstalling, creating a separate account, but nothing seems to work. Disappointed. Please fix.

This was a good app years ago (when it worked) but it's always been incredibly unstable. Now it's locked me out. I uninstalled/reinstalled, tried to log in but the screen just freezes... which is typical. There's some good deals on it, but I'd say about half the times I try it, it just bugs out.

title: Find job offers - Trovit Jobs
description:
Trovit Jobs finds job vacancies in thousands of different websites and shows them to you in one place. That way, you can be sure that you will find your dream job, no matter how hidden it is. Easy, convenient and fast. That’s our promise. 

♣FILTERS TO FIND THE PERFECT JOB
Trovit allows you to filter your search results to find the jobs that interest you. You can select your sector, city, publication date, type of contract, working hours, necessary experience, salary and a long list of other criteria.

♥SAVE THE BEST JOB OFFERS IN YOUR BOOKMARKS
Don’t you hate it when you find a vacancy, but somehow you don’t remember where or when was posted? Bookmark any listings you like in the Favourites section. Even if you accidentally delete the app, you will be able to recover your favourite jobs. 

♦PERSONALIZED ALERTS, TAILORED SPECIFICALLY FOR YOU
When you close the app, Trovit Jobs keeps working for you. Just create an alert (or several) and we will send you a notification when there’s a new ad that matches your search criteria. We follow thousands of job board websites minute by minute so you don’t have to. You can create as many alerts as you want to, with your ideal position, your favourite companies or the perfect combination of lots of factors. 

♠HOW TO FIND YOUR DREAM JOB IN TROVIT JOBS

If you are looking to find a new job, searching on Trovit couldn’t be easier. 
1. Type your search criteria and select which kind of vacancy are you looking for.
2. If you want, you can apply filters to that search. You will find the filters in the upper right hand-corner of the screen.
3. Take a good look at all the selected jobs. Don’t forget to save the ones you like the most in Favourites!
4. Create personalized alerts for every search you’re interested in. You’ll be able to activate or deactivate the notifications for each search, at the bottom of each search results page or in the settings section. 
5. We will send you alerts when there’s a new ad that matches all the conditions that you selected. 

You can check as many listings as you want, absolutely free. It doesn’t matter if you are looking to work from home,  a government job, online jobs, security jobs... you will find it at Trovit. 


►WHY TROVIT?
You have two options when looking for job offers: you can either try visiting all the websites and services on a daily basis, typing the same search queries over and over, hoping to find the perfect job before anyone else. Or, you can set up search filters in Trovit Jobs, create an alert, and sit back to watch the magic happen. Trovit Jobs is your starting point for an intelligent and extensive search. 

Look for job offers listed in 19 different languages and in 46 different countries. Trovit Jobs includes among its sources hundreds of United States based companies and headhunters. Find your dream job  in New York, Los Angeles, Chicago, Houston, Philadelphia, Phoenix, San Antonio, San Diego, Dallas, San Jose, Austin, Jacksonville, San Francisco, Indianapolis, Columbus, Detroit, Washington DC, Seattle, Denver, Memphis, Boston, Nashville, El Paso, Milwaukee, Albuquerque, Tucson, Fresno, Louisville, Sacramento, Long Beach, Kansas City, Mesa, Atlanta, Virgina Beach, Portland, Omaha, Colorado Springs, Miami, Oakland, Minneapolis, tulsa, Cleveland or a long list of other towns and cities. 

OTHER TROVIT SERVICES
Remember that, besides Trovit Jobs, you can also use Trovit Homes and Trovit Cars. In Trovit Homes you will find all the listings of homes for sale and to rent in one single search engine. Trovit Cars will help you find your perfect car, searching through several car listing websites and services with one single search. 

If you have any doubts, problems or suggestions, please do write us an email at android@trovit.com and we will do our best to fix whatever’s bothering you. If you enjoy Trovit Jobs, please leave us a review on Google Play: it helps us grow and maintain a quality free service!

title: The ENTERTAINER
description:
6 MILLION+ DOWNLOADS AND COUNTING 

The ENTERTAINER is the moneysaving app that’s packed with the 2-for-1 offers everyone wants. Join millions of people who are making BIG SAVINGS on thousands of experiences. 

OFFERS FOR EVERYTHING 

Fine dining restaurants; casual dining and drinks; luxurious spa treatments; beauty basics; high-energy workouts; handy services; top leisure attractions and hotels for less – you’ll find it all on the ENTERTAINER app. 

SHARING IS CARING

Want to help friends and family save every day? Share your app on multiple devices.

PING OFFERS

TRACK YOUR SAVINGS

recentChanges:
Humble with a hint of upgrades.
A lot of rain can bring a lot of delays to your delivery. We hate that too. Now we will let you know if restaurants are foreseeing delays so you can grab a snack until your food gets to you.
Also, improved how the offers look in the app.

Oh yeah, we’ve also squashed a few bugs as well and Yeezy it was fun!
comments: The worst customer service.... firstly you dont have a number on your app to contact customer support or complaints. The person on the chat never has any solution to any issues. Not sure why do you even have a chat service when you cannot help your customer. I had just purchased the Bundle with Cheers included. However due to some error on the app I cannot use Cheers. I had only realised it when I tried using it last night.When I reported to chat service I was denied any solution. TERRIBLE...!!!
App lags at times. Was quite embarished when I ordered at pizza hut and it kept showing error message. Other then that, it is extremely worthid. Saved R114 with one order.

Amazing deals, the service is 5 star. But the app is kind of bad, it's not the easiest to find stuff in your area or somewhere you are planning to go. A map with pins of all the activities in that area would be nice to have on the home screen bar. Thing is that I know this is on the app but I always struggle to find it because it is not easy accessable. Apart from that it's really worth having this even if you sometimes spend time digging through deals to find one that suits you.

Cape Town 2019 worked wonderfully, but I wasted my money buying for 2020 because the app stopped working. I cannot log in, I just get Failed, Please Try Again over & over again. I know my login details are correct, because it lets me login on the website on a PC. But that is of no use if I can't log into phone app. Customer Service just says they verify my account is fine and that their app is fine. But then why could I log in last year and now not? So disappointed, because last year was great.

I have registered for The Entertainer 2020 app and already availed the offer once and i keep getting emails to my registered email id. But now app shows as all my offers as locked. When i contacted The Entertainer they are saying that nothing is registered with my email id. If nothing is registered why am i getting email asking fo review of my usage in 2020. I have never experienced such a pathetic service any service provider. Worst experience ever.
